How to trade on Friday 51,938.05 9 Advances 3 Declines 11,752.02 110 Advances 90 Declines 49,244.05 79 Advances 47 Declines 58,908.78 6 Advances 4 Declines 23,928.20 304 Advances 196 Declines 16,878 34 Advances 16 Declines 14,391.40 109 Advances 91 Declines 26,872.99 44 Advances 56 Declines The Nifty is the flagship benchmark of the National Stock Exchange (NSE), which is a well-diversified index, comprising top 50 companies in terms of free-float market capitalisation that are traded on the bourse. It is supposed to reflect the health of the listed universe of Indian companies, and hence the broader economy, in all market conditions. Officially called the Nifty50, the index is computed using the free float market capitalisation method, which is essentially the count of shares in active circulation in the market at any given point of time. The Nifty, just like BSE benchmark Sensex, is today used for benchmarking portfolios and returns of mutual fund schemes and launching index funds. The Nifty index was launched on April 22, 1996, with a base value of 1,000 counted from November 3, 1995. Live Nifty quotes are available on NSEIndia.com, ETMarkets.com and numerous other web platforms and TV channels at any point of time. The Nifty brand and indices are managed by the Mumbai-based India Index Services and Products Limited, IISL in short, which itself is a subsidiary of NSE. IISL has a three-tier governance structure comprising the board of directors, the index policy committee and the index maintenance sub-committee. IISL managed some 67 indices under the Nifty brand as of September 30, 2016. IISL rebalances the Nifty index semi-annually. The cut-off dates for the semi-annual review of the index are January 31 and July 31 each year. Average data for the six months ending the cut-off date is considered. The exchange notifies any change in the index four weeks before such changes take effect. There are defined eligibility criteria for selection of Nifty constituent stocks. The liquidity of a stock is measured by the market impact cost, which is essentially the cost involved in transacting a stock. For a stock to qualify for inclusion in the Nifty50, it must have traded at an average impact cost of 0.50 per cent or less for six months and for 90 per cent of observation cases. Besides, the company must have a listing history of at least six months. However, a newly-listed company, which has just got listed through the IPO route, may become eligible for inclusion in the index, if it fulfils the normal eligibility criteria for a three- month period instead of six months. Only those stocks which are eligible for trade in the F&O segment of NSE are considered for inclusion as Nifty constituents. As of September 20, 2017, the Nifty had 35.73 per cent components from the financial services sector, 14 per cent from the energy sector, 11.46 per cent from the information technology sector, 10.64 per cent from the automobile sector and 10.13 per cent from the consumer goods sector. Six of the nine BFSI companies in the Nifty50 were private banks. The Nifty index also has several variants such as Nifty Junior, Nifty50 USD, Nifty50 Total Returns index and NIFTY50 Dividend Points Index. BROWSE COMPANIES:

Oracle Expands Distributed Cloud Innovations to Drive AI and Cloud Service Advancements Across Major Platforms
Article Content: Oracle announced new¬†Oracle Cloud Infrastructure¬†(OCI)¬†distributed cloud¬†innovations to help meet the rapidly growing global demand for its AI and cloud services. The latest innovations span Oracle Database@AWS, Oracle Database@Azure, Oracle Database@Google Cloud, OCI Dedicated Region, and OCI Supercluster. With Oracle‚Äôs distributed cloud, customers can deploy OCI‚Äôs 150+ AI and cloud services at the edge, in their own datacenter, across clouds, or in the public cloud and can help address a variety of data privacy, sovereign AI, and low latency requirements. In addition, Oracle Cloud is available in more locations than any other hyperscaler, with 85 regions live and 77 planned. ‚ÄúOur priority is giving customers the choice and flexibility to leverage cloud services in the model that makes the most sense for their business,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúWith OCI‚Äôs distributed cloud capabilities, we‚Äôre helping customers deploy a dedicated cloud in a small, scalable footprint, build applications with the best services across cloud providers, and deploy AI infrastructure anywhere they want. This flexibility helps our customers address their unique needs and support their cloud investments in delivering significant business value.‚Äù OCI is now taking orders for the largest AI supercomputer in the cloud‚Äîavailable with up to 131,072 NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs‚Äîdelivering an unprecedented 2.4 zettaFLOPS of peak performance. The maximum scale of¬†OCI Supercluster¬†offers more than three times as many GPUs as the Frontier supercomputer and more than six times that of other hyperscalers. OCI Supercluster includes OCI Compute Bare Metal, ultra-low latency RoCEv2 with ConnectX-7 NICs and ConnectX-8 SuperNICs or NVIDIA Quantum-2 InfiniBand-based networks, and a choice of HPC storage. Oracle and NVIDIA are delivering accelerated computing and generative AI services that help organizations build and maintain sovereign AI models in their country or retain AI-generated data with strong data residency controls. OCI Compute based on NVIDIA L40S GPUs, NVIDIA Hopper architecture GPUs, and NVIDIA Blackwell platforms are now orderable to support sovereign AI deployments. NVIDIA Omniverse, a platform for developing OpenUSD applications for industrial digitalization and generative physical AI, is validated on OCI and available to support many developer use cases, including sovereign AI. A new OCI Dedicated Region configuration‚ÄîDedicated Region25‚Äîwill be available in a smaller, scalable size starting at only three racks and rapidly deployable within weeks. Dedicated Region25 has a 75 percent smaller launch footprint and simplified datacenter requirements, supports OCI‚Äôs 150+ AI and cloud services and allows a wider range of customers to gain the agility, economics, and scale of the public cloud in their own datacenters. The new configuration will be available in the next calendar year. OCI enables customers to combine cloud services from multiple clouds to optimize cost, functionality, and performance. With Oracle Database@AWS, Oracle Database@Azure, and Oracle Database@Google Cloud, customers gain direct access to Oracle Database services running on OCI and deployed directly in the datacenters of the four largest hyperscalers. Through these partnerships, customer have the flexibility to run their applications across clouds and combine all the benefits of Oracle Database services with services from other cloud providers for a seamless multicloud experience. In addition, customer benefit from the simplicity, security, and low latency of a unified operating environment. OCI Roving Edge Infrastructure enhancements support remote AI inferencing: New versions of the OCI Roving Edge Device, including a new three-GPU option optimized for AI, are now generally available to help customers leverage remote AI inferencing at the edge. This enables customers to manage mission-critical data at the edge and run domain-specific LLMs or computer vision even in remote or disconnected locations. OCI Roving Edge Infrastructure consists of multiple configurations of ruggedized and portable high-performance devices, weighing less than 35 lb. (without the case), equipped with 56 cores (102 virtual CPUs), 512 GB of RAM, and up to 123 TB of storage. HeatWave delivers new GenAI and multicloud capabilities: New HeatWave capabilities and innovations help organizations easily and securely take advantage of generative AI both in OCI and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Additional new capabilities help customers quickly and securely implement lakehouse and machine learning applications for a wider variety of use cases, as well as help improve the performance and manageability of transactional applications. New OCI Generative AI innovations help customers turn data into a competitive advantage: OCI Generative AI (GenAI) Agents with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) capabilities and enhanced Oracle AI innovations are now generally available. The new capabilities help customers turn their data into a competitive advantage by making it easier to apply AI to real-world business operations. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Oracle Launches Fusion Cloud Sustainability to Drive Efficient Reporting
Article Content: Oracle announced Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability, a new application within¬†Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite¬†that helps organizations efficiently manage and report on sustainability initiatives. Offered to customers at no additional cost, Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability provides business leaders with a flexible framework to capture and analyze critical sustainability data to enhance reporting, expand insights, improve decision-making, and accelerate progress towards environmental goals. ‚ÄúCustomers consistently tell us that the greatest barrier to understanding their environmental impact is the time and complexity required to chase down, organize, and analyze the necessary data,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúWith Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability, customers can eliminate these challenges, efficiently align data with the latest regional guidelines, automate sustainability reporting processes, improve decision-making, and accelerate progress on their sustainability goals.‚Äù Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability integrates data from¬†Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)¬†and¬†Oracle Fusion Cloud Supply Chain & Manufacturing (SCM)¬†enabling analysis and reporting within¬†Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Performance Management (EPM)¬†and¬†Oracle Fusion Data Intelligence. With Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability, business leaders benefit from: Automated transaction records:¬†Enable business leaders to increase the speed, accuracy, and transparency of sustainability reporting by using AI, classification rules, and sustainability metadata attributes to automatically create activity records and add transactions to a sustainability ledger. Contextualized data:¬†Enables business leaders to gain the context needed to drive impactful decisions by allowing them to view the operational data in Oracle Cloud ERP, Oracle Cloud EPM, and Oracle Cloud SCM so they can see assets, processes, suppliers, or products that need attention. Prebuilt dashboards:¬†Enable business leaders to gain a holistic view of sustainability performance and drill down into the underlying details to inform next steps by automatically exporting data to sustainability dashboards with prebuilt KPIs and custom analyses in Oracle Fusion Data Intelligence. Rigorous audit and traceability capabilities:¬†Enable business leaders to improve report accuracy and transparency by providing financial-grade audit traceability and tamper-proof ledger entries that deliver a full record of all activities and events with sustainability impact, along with any associated emissions. Sophisticated emission factor mapping:¬†Enables business leaders to calculate¬†their organizations‚Äô carbon footprint and obtain a more thorough understanding of the environmental impact of business decisions. Business leaders can also automatically calculate emissions for any type of activity using representative values (emission factors) and comparisons (global warming potentials) and perform the required conversion of units of measure and currency. Comprehensive integrations:¬†Enable business leaders to streamline data collection from third-party applications and track activity needed to meet reporting requirements by importing activity data directly from external sources¬†via REST APIs and spreadsheets. Oracle Fusion Applications Suite enables organizations to take advantage of the cloud and the latest advancements in AI to break down organizational silos, standardize processes, and manage finance, HR, supply chain, and customer experience data on a single integrated cloud platform. With updates delivered every quarter, Oracle Fusion Applications Suite helps organizations embrace continuous innovation and stay ahead of whatever comes next. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: HP Spectre x360 14
Article Content: The HP Spectre x360 14-inch is a stylish and versatile 2-in-1 device, perfect for a range of scenarios thanks to its portability. Its lightweight and convertible design make it an excellent choice for frequent travelers and business professionals. For a thorough and unbiased assessment, check out our detailed review by the DT. Read on to discover more. The HP Spectre x360 14 boasts a practical, premium design with a minimalist aesthetic. The laptop‚Äôs metal construction not only adds a fantastic finish but also ensures durability. This AI-powered 360-degree convertible laptop is available in three stunning color options‚ÄîSlate Blue, Sahara Silver, and Nightfall Black‚Äîall featuring a glossy finish. Weighing just 1.34 kg, it‚Äôs lightweight and portable, making it perfect for on-the-go use. The included rechargeable stylus, which magnetically attaches to the laptop‚Äôs side, adds to its convenience. The design features an accent finish on the corners for added protection, while the more rectangular shape offers a sleek, sophisticated look with pared-down luxury. The hinge is engraved with 'Spectre' for branding, and dual speakers are positioned on both sides of the laptop for enhanced audio quality. The HP Spectre x360 14 is designed to boost productivity, making it ideal for both office use and entertainment. It features a stunning 2.8k OLED display with a 14-inch diagonal size, offering vibrant visuals. The touchscreen capability allows you to use it as a tablet, with multitouch support and a fast 48-120 Hz refresh rate, plus a 0.2 ms response time for quick and smooth input. The micro-edge anti-reflection Corning glass, combined with a low blue light feature, helps protect your eyes during long working hours. With SDR 400 nits and HDR 500 nits brightness, the display delivers true-to-life colors and sharp, bright images, ensuring an immersive viewing experience. The HP Spectre comes equipped with an HP Wide Vision 9MP IR camera, complete with a camera shutter for added privacy, ensuring you avoid accidental visual contact during video calls. The 9-megapixel resolution provides bright, clear images with minimal noise, and it includes features to blur or replace your background as needed. The camera also adapts seamlessly to various lighting conditions. For audio, the Poly Studio setup includes two front-firing woofers and two top-firing tweeters, delivering a more immersive and balanced listening experience. Whether for music or gaming, this audio system enhances your experience with rich, clear sound. The full-size backlit keyboard on the HP Spectre offers a single color with ideal key travel, ensuring a comfortable typing experience. The smooth touchpad is responsive and easily supports multiple gestures, enhancing productivity. Additionally, the magnetic stylus is a valuable tool for content creators and digital art designers, enabling them to work with precise detail and accuracy. The HP Spectre x360 14-inch offers versatile connectivity options, including two Thunderbolt 4 ports with a 40Gbps signaling rate, one USB Type-C port, and one USB Type-A port with a 10Gbps signaling rate. Additionally, it features a headphone jack for audio needs. The laptop also comes with a Type-C connector that includes one HDMI port and two USB Type-A ports, providing even more flexibility for connecting devices and peripherals. The HP Spectre x360 14 is powered by the robust Intel Core Ultra 7 155H processor and runs on the Windows 11 Home 64 operating system, ensuring smooth and efficient performance. It comes equipped with 32 GB of LPDDR5x-6400 MHz RAM for seamless multitasking and a 1 TB PCIe NVMe TLC M.2 SSD for ample and fast storage. The laptop also features the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology and supports Wi-Fi 7, providing advanced connectivity options for an enhanced user experience. The HP Spectre x360 14 is available at a price of ‚Çπ1,64,999, reflecting its premium build, advanced features, and powerful performance. The HP Spectre x360 14 has earned a 5/5 rating from DT. After thoroughly testing and using the laptop across various departments for over 30 days, we can confidently say that it‚Äôs an ideal solution for people on the go. At our DT office, we closely monitored its speed, performance, and all its features, and we found its overall performance to be highly satisfactory. Whether for work, creativity, or entertainment, the Spectre x360 14 consistently delivered on all fronts, making it a standout choice for professionals and tech enthusiasts alike. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: Marshall Motif II ANC
Article Content: The ease of use that a hands-free earbud delivers is unmatched as this gadget not only uplifts your music listening and calling experience rather, enhances your style statement as well. Today, we're diving into the Marshall Motif II ANC TWS Earbuds, a pair that promises to deliver not just stellar audio but also an elevated listening experience with advanced active noise cancellation. Read the complete review to uncover every minute detail about this product in the most honest and experienced way. Keep reading. The Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds offer exceptional sound quality, in a compact package. With an enhanced design that allows for hours of comfortable use, whether during a short session or a marathon listening experience, these earbuds are crafted for those who value both form and function. Featuring the iconic Marshall M logo on the buds, Motif II ANC combines rugged durability, making sure you‚Äôre always prepared for travel. Compared to the predecessor, the latest Motif II ANC model is poised to deliver 10 hours longer playtime. With the charging case, you can enjoy up to 30 hours of listening with ANC activated and a remarkable 43 hours without it. At the same time, it delivers 6 hours of playtime on its own with ANC and 9 hours sans ANC This extended battery life ensures you can go longer without needing to recharge. In addition, the active noise cancellation technology improves the listening experience as considerably eliminates background noise. To charge the Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds, simply place them in the case for a boost. The charging case features LED lights that indicate the current battery level and let you know when the battery is fully charged. If you're in a hurry, the quick charging feature is a lifesaver, providing up to 1 hour of playtime with just a 15-minute charge. For prolonged battery life, customize the limitations levels in the settings for charging such as max charge limit, temperature limit, and charging speed, and get a longer battery lifetime. These adjustments help ensure that your earbuds enjoy a prolonged battery life, keeping them ready for your next listening session. The earbuds take connectivity to the next level with Bluetooth LE Audio technology. This ensures a robust and future-proof connection, providing you with the best possible audio experience without interruptions. These earbuds can be paired with two devices simultaneously, allowing you to switch between them effortlessly. Once connected, the Motif II ANC takes full advantage of the latest Bluetooth advancements, ensuring a seamless and reliable connection that keeps your music and calls crystal clear, no matter which device you're using. One of the standout features of the Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds is the Marshall Bluetooth App, which unlocks a range of advanced functionalities. Through this app, you can personalize your listening experience by fine-tuning your EQ settings, adjusting the ANC levels, and managing software updates to keep your device running with the latest enhancements. Apart from leveraging extra features, it facilitates accessing the App Store, and Google Play, and managing updates. However, no app is required to connect the headphones with the device as it can be paired independently. One of the groundbreaking features of the Marshall Motif II ANC is the Transparency mode, which allows its users to be more aware while traveling on the road. This means it enables you to keep track of your surroundings while you are talking and walking outside and ensure your safety. Additionally, the Ear Detect feature utilizes built-in sensors to detect when the earbuds are in or out of your ears. This smart functionality automatically pauses your audio when you remove the earbuds and resumes playback when you put them back in, providing a seamless listening experience without any interruptions. Connecting the Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds to the devices follow these simple steps: Open the device case. Press and hold the button until the blue light pulses Find your headphones from the Bluetooth list popping up in the device‚Äôs Bluetooth list Download the Marshall Bluetooth App on your device, follow the on-screen instructions, and finish the setup. Ready to use The Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds are available for purchase at ‚Çπ19,999 on Amazon. The Marshall Motif II ANC has several innovative features that enable us to customize the buds according to our preferences. Another impressive feature is the ANC control and transparency mode that is introduced keeping road safety on point, which is quite commendable. The compatibility with the two devices kept us busy at work and meanwhile enjoying music to keep work pressure at bay. Our team at DT thoroughly enjoyed the review process and found the earbuds to deliver on their promises. As a result, DT gives the Marshall Motif II ANC a solid thumbs up with a rating of 4 out of 5. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: mTap Digital Business Card
Article Content: Gone are the days when business networking relied heavily on traditional paper business cards. The world is rapidly embracing digital solutions, and the mTap Digital Business Card is leading the charge as a modern alternative. Designed for today's fast-paced, tech-savvy professionals, the mTap Digital Business Card offers a sleek and efficient way to manage your networking needs. We recently received the mTap Digital Business Card with premium membership, and here‚Äôs a detailed review based on real-time experience: NFC (Near Field Communication) operates through innovative wireless communication technology when brought close to a compatible device. This tool harnesses a technique similar to infrared (IR) which was once used to transfer data from one device to another in older mobile phones. The same NFC technique is used in gaming controllers and headphones to enhance compatibility with paired devices. The mTap Digital Business Card works by drawing it closer to the NFC-enabled smartphones. After tapping it on your phone, a notification pops up, and then all the business-related contact details appear on the mobile screen, containing the address, company name, designation, social media links on all registered portals, and work-related links at the receiving end. This also allows you to share your WhatsApp contact details. The analytics of this card enables its users to check the number of viewers of a profile. The card is customizable according to your brand‚Äôs colour and style to enhance your digital identity. With just a single tap and within 60 seconds via the QR code on the back, the card is all set for seamless digital professional networking. The mTap hub is designed to efficiently organize, connect, and manage contacts and interactions right from your command center. You can easily add a widget and scan a business card or another mTap card to retrieve the details. This allows you to create and manage multiple profiles for different businesses. On non-NFC enabled devices, you can use the QR code at mTap card‚Äôs back and obtain details All the contact information is easily manageable through CRM Setting up an mTap profile is easy to navigate. Simply download the app from the App Store or Play Store, then choose one of your preferred sign-up options from email, Google, Apple, or LinkedIn. After signing up, you'll be prompted to build your profile and add your website. Click "continue," and then select "yes" to allow the AI to automatically pull your LinkedIn profile, profile picture, logo, and social media handles. mTap automatically applies your brand colors to your profile by analyzing the logo. Then edit your profile to include pictures, contact details, calendar links, presentations, brochures, images, videos, text, and other links you wish to share with your prospects. In the "Manage Links" section, mTap allows adding and organizing all necessary links. The profile can be previewed by tapping on the 'Preview' option. To update your mTap account, go to the 'Main Profile' section to revise your personal and professional details. The premium membership truly elevates the mTap experience, unlocking a host of additional features that go beyond basic networking. With this membership, users can save contacts, making follow-ups and relationship management easier. Additionally, the ability to save the location where you met someone adds a unique touch, helping to contextualize connections. These features, make the premium membership a valuable investment for serious networkers looking to maximize their professional interactions. Using the mTap Digital Business Card was a seamless experience, blending innovation with practicality. The instant access to contact details and the ability to share them effortlessly left a lasting impression. The card‚Äôs customizable features allowed us to tailor the experience to reflect our brand identity, making every interaction feel personalized and professional. Overall, the mTap Digital Business Card delivered on its promise of modernizing business networking in an efficient and user-friendly way. mTap Business Card costs a one-time payment of ‚Çπ2500. In case, if the card is broken, you have to make another purchase. Other additional services are available with the purchase which can increase or decrease the price from the given range. With just a single tap on the phone, all your details are shared, which is quite commendable. The mTap Business Card is gaining popularity through word-of-mouth, and we were eager to experience the seamless sharing of professional information. After evaluating its functionality and effectiveness, we rate the mTap Business Card at 4 out of 5 stars. This score reflects its impressive ease of use and potential for enhancing networking ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Oracle‚Äôs New Fusion Cloud CX Features Offer Enhanced Collaboration and Efficiency
Article Content: Oracle announced new capabilities within¬†Oracle Fusion Cloud Customer Experience (CX)¬†that give buyers self-service access to a unified and active view of their commercial relationship with an organization. The latest updates provide buying groups and selling teams with a collaborative commerce solution that delivers a view of quotes, orders, account and contact profiles, subscriptions, renewals, and assets to help drive better outcomes and revenue throughout the life of a business relationship. ‚ÄúBy unifying buying, selling, ordering, and billing flows across the organization, we‚Äôre enabling enterprise organizations to bring new value to their customers as they build better long-term relationships,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve spent the last year folding our industry-leading Commerce offering into our unified revenue transformation solution, so now our customers can easily activate a buying channel that handles all the complexities of B2B selling.‚Äù The new digital buying experience connects processes and data from customer experience and financial applications in Oracle‚Äôs¬†revenue transformation¬†solution to support increasingly sophisticated go-to-market models such as recurring revenue, usage-based, and consumption-based strategies. New use cases include: Self-service access:¬†Helps organizations engage with buyer groups through shared access to quotes, orders, account and contact profiles, subscriptions, and renewals. Assisted buying experiences:¬†Empowers buying groups to engage with selling teams and find a solution to their needs by evaluating product fit, negotiating pricing or terms, or assistance with placing orders. Full-service sales engagements:¬†Empowers sellers to engage buyers with an intelligent, interactive buying experience from sharing quotes and content all the way through onboarding a new account. Generative AI for contract summarization:¬†Helps organizations reduce contract processing time and close deals faster by providing quick answers to contract-related questions, helping sellers and buying groups to track important milestones and obligations, and enables better internal oversight. Generative AI for sellers:¬†Helps sellers quickly capitalize on sales opportunities and efficiently engage with buyers to drive further account expansion by drafting emails, activity summaries, sales executive briefings, and executive summaries for quotes and proposals. Unified CPQ, contracts, and order management:¬†Helps organizations increase the speed and accuracy of transactions, manage complex enterprise sales agreements, and honor pre-negotiated terms during the ordering process by unifying contract management, order management, subscription management and configure, price, and quote (CPQ) capabilities in Oracle Cloud CX. ‚ÄúRevenue leaders are challenged with keeping up with what customers need, when they need it, and how they want to buy it. It gets even more challenging when managing multiple revenue streams, channels, and products,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs great to see Oracle consistently investing in its CX solutions that are now able to make B2B buying much easier, better the experience, and ultimately increase revenue.‚Äù ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: HONOR 200 Lite Launching on September 19 with Stunning Features and Elegant Design
Article Content: HONOR¬†is expanding its portfolio in the market with the addition of the third member in the¬†HONOR¬†200¬†series family - the¬†HONOR¬†200¬†Lite¬†set to launch in India on¬†19th September 2024 12 noon. The smartphone will enhance user experience with its super light-weight body, exceptional portrait photography and a stunning yet comforting display, this device offers all of these features wrapped in a sleek, durable, and elegant design. With its effortless usability and cutting-edge technology, the¬†HONOR¬†200¬†Lite¬†will be available for purchase on¬†Amazon.in, , and at mainline stores At the centre of the HONOR 200 Lite is its triple camera system, designed to deliver unparalleled photo quality. Equipped with a 108MP Main Camera (f/1.75 aperture), Wide & Depth Camera (f/2.2 aperture), and Macro Camera (f/2.4 aperture), the device captures vibrant and detailed images even in low light conditions. The versatile portrait modes‚Äîfeaturing 1x Environmental Portrait, 2x Atmospheric Portrait, and 3x Close-up Portrait‚Äîallow users to take professional-quality photos at different focal lengths. The 50MP Front Camera is perfect for selfies, featuring AI Wide-angle Selfie functionality that adjusts to a 90¬∞ Field of View (FOV) for group selfies, ensuring everyone fits into the frame. Additionally, the Selfie Light adds a professional touch by enhancing the clarity and detail of every shot. The HONOR 200 Lite combines durability with style. Measuring just 6.78mm thick and weighing 166g, the device is built to withstand everyday wear and tear and accidental drops, earning an SGS 5-star Drop Resistance certification. Its sleek design comes in vibrant color options like Starry Blue, Cyan Lake, and Midnight Black, catering to different users‚Äô style preferences. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Sekel Technologies Aiming to Empower Small Retailers to Compete On A Level Playing Field With Larger Brands
Article Content: Sekel Tech addresses some of the most pressing challenges businesses face today, particularly in the hyperlocal digital marketing space. Our primary focus is on enhancing customer engagement and responsiveness, areas where many businesses struggle. By integrating real-time insights, automated marketing, and cutting-edge data analytics, we ensure marketing efforts are streamlined with precision. This helps in reducing the turnaround time for businesses to go hyperlocal from several months to just 48 hours. This agility allows businesses to meet the growing demand for near-me searches and quick commerce, ensuring they remain relevant and competitive in a rapidly changing market.  Since Sekel Tech was launched, it has evolved by continuously adapting to the changing landscape of consumer behaviour. Our revamped product dashboard is a testament to this evolution. We have incorporated features like the ability to post directly to Google My Business Listings and run paid ad campaigns on platforms like Google, Facebook, and Instagram‚Äîall from a single dashboard. Additionally, we've improved our SellerApp, which now enables businesses to retarget customers via SMS, Email, and WhatsApp. The emphasis is on simplicity, speed, and security, with our solutions being fully compliant with the Security Operations Centre (SOC) Framework. These changes are driven by a deep understanding of how consumers interact with technology today, making our dashboard more intuitive and user-friendly, allowing businesses to unlock hidden potentials with ease.  Our new logo and tagline, ‚ÄòGoing Beyond,‚Äô symbolise Sekel Tech‚Äôs commitment to innovation and our forward-thinking approach. The pantone blue and black colour scheme embodies trust, stability, and our cutting-edge solutions. This brand evolution reflects our focus on dynamic engagement, always being in motion, and delivering location-specific, tech-specific solutions that truly resonate with our clients. ‚ÄòGoing Beyond‚Äô is not a mere tagline, but reflects a promise that we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in hyperlocal marketing, ensuring that our clients are equipped to exceed their goals in this new era of consumer engagement.  We understand that small retailers often lack the time and resources for extensive training. That is primarily why we have designed our tools to be intuitive and user-friendly. The revamped dashboard offers a streamlined experience, allowing retailers to go live within 48 hours without needing to navigate complex systems. Additionally, our support team is always ready to assist with any queries, ensuring that even those with minimal technical expertise can leverage our solutions effectively. Our goal is to empower small retailers to compete on a level playing field with larger brands, without the burden of extensive learning curves.  The new features on our dashboard are transformative for small retailers, enabling them to engage with local customers more effectively and efficiently. With direct access to platforms like Google My Business and the ability to run targeted ad campaigns on social media, retailers can now connect with their customers in real time, responding to their needs more swiftly. The integration of retargeting options through SMS, Email, and WhatsApp further enhances their ability to maintain continuous engagement. These features ensure that small retailers can build stronger, more personalised relationships with their customers, driving loyalty and boosting sales in a competitive marketplace. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Product Review - ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024
Article Content: Multi-screen laptops are groundbreaking innovations designed to enhance productivity and user experience by incorporating multiple displays. This time, our experts at the DT got to review the ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024, a double-screen laptop with the convenience of a detachable keyboard. Read the complete review to know our experience and findings with this device. The ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 harnesses the goodness of a double screen to multiply the workspace. The laptop boasts a display with 180¬∞ lay-flat hinge, enabling content sharing during presentations and business meetings. Both the panels measure 14‚Äù FHD+ (1920 x 1200) OLED touchscreen with a 16:10 aspect ratio for enhanced productivity. In addition, the 100% DCI-P3 color gamut delivers more accurate and vibrant graphics essential for demanding tasks like editing, and graphic designing, and the high 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio provides a more dynamic and immersive viewing experience, while 91% screen-to-body ratio maximizes display area. Also, the display is Pantone-validated and qualifies for Dolby Vision Display HDR, and True Black 500 certification, making it perfect for professional work and content consumption. Besides, the 0.2ms response time and 60Hz refresh rate offer faster pixel transition and smoothened content consumption. Also, the 500-nit peak brightness enhances brightness in a bright environment, while being a TUV Rheinland-certified SGS-Eye-Care Display, it reduces blue light omission and minimizes glare and reflection issues. The laptop comes with an integrated double-hinged kickstand, simplifying usage in sharing mode, dual-screen mode, desktop mode, or laptop mode as per the use case. Instead of an all-metal build, it is very portable as 14.6mm thin and weighs just 1.35 kg weight without the keyboard and 1.65kg with the keyboard. The Zenbook DUO comes loaded with a wide selection of intuitive software features, aiming at elevating the handling experience and offering comfort right to your fingertips. Plus, the OLED touchscreen bolsters intuitive gestures, including swiping with six fingers to acknowledge the virtual keyboard, swiping out with five fingers to maximize the active window, a three-finger tap on the virtual touchpad, etc. The device boasts innovative redesigned ScreenXpert features, like App Navigator, App Switcher, Microphone Switcher, Sharing Mode, Control Centre, Motion Wallpaper, Brightness, etc. With up to Intel Core Ultra 9 Processor 185H with a maximum processing speed of up to 5.1GHz, 16Cores, and 22Threads that successfully manage multitasking. While Intel Arc iGPU facilitates improved graphical tasks. In addition, the Intel AI Boost NPU accelerates AI-related workloads. Besides, the ‚ÄúAdvanced Cooling System‚Äù is designed to efficiently manage the heat produced by both the CPU and GPU in a device; which can handle the combined thermal load of up to 35 watts to ensure safe temperature during longer working hours. Also, the Intel Evo certification marks the quality, long battery life, reliable performance, and advanced connectivity of the Zenbook DUO The device operates at a high frequency of 7467 MHz using the LPDDR5X standard. The high 32GB RAM allows for multitasking and faster data access while handling memory-seeking applications such as gaming. Meanwhile, the M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD used in the device provides up to 2TB of storage space allowing for storing a substantial amount of data, including operating systems, applications, and user files, and faster data access and transfer. The device leverages the potential for a 75Wh battery and uninterruptedly lasts for up to 13 hours in the charger in a single stretch depending on the usage. The system boasts a USB-PD fast-charging feature that bolsters for a quick recharge of the battery via Type-C charger support. The combination offers efficient charging convenient and long-lasting power. Also, the 65W adapter is provided to support charging ASUS Pen Stylus. The Zenbook DUO keyboard offers an unmatched typing experience due to 19.5 mm pitch, 1.4 mm key travel, 19.05 mm pitch, and 0.3 mm dish-shaped indentation akin to a desktop PC. The keyboard is detachable, backlit full-sized, and comes along with a responsive touchpad measuring 74mm in width, 129.7 mm in length, and 0.23 mm in travel distance for easy navigation. Also, the dual-mode keyboard features pogo pins as connectors for clamshell use to attach both keyboards to functionalize every feature while using both the screens and wireless Bluetooth capabilities for increased display usage. This design allows the keyboard to connect directly and reliably when the device is in clamshell mode and to function wirelessly when using the device in a multi-screen setup. The  provides a comprehensive range of ports including 2 Thunderbolt four ports for 100W power, and 40Gb/s data, alongside external 4K displays, one USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-A, one full-size HDMI 2.1, and one 3.5mm combo-audio-jack. Also, the model offers rich connectivity options due to the latest 5.3 Bluetooth, 6E Wi-Fi, and ASUS Smart Connect. The system also bolsters a USB-PD-supported fast charging with a Type-C charger. The laptop comes with ASUS Pen 2.0 Stylus input support that is equally supportive on both screens with 4,096 pressure levels. The Stylus enables users to input text using a finger or included ASUS Pen stylus to adhere to the handwriting feature of this model. It is compatible with any application that requires typing or text entry and artistic work. The dual-screen laptop possesses an FHD 3DNR IR webcam that delivers high-quality video required for video calls and recordings. With the IR Webcam Windows Hello support, the device supports facial recognition or a fingerprint scan for logging in in any light condition. Also, the 3DNR technique reduces noise and graininess in low-light conditions for better image quality. For audio, the ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 features a built-in array microphone, and a Harman Kardon, Dolby Atmos sound system alongside 2 built-in Stereo speakers. Also, the Smart AMP amplifies the sound output to 350% louder without distortion, while the Audio Booster enhances the listening experience. The two-way ASUS-AiSense-Noise-Canceling-Technology utilizes AI for more effective noise cancellation for an immersive call quality during meetings. The ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 is available to purchase at a starting price of Rs. 1,59,990. Also, it comes with a subscription to Adobe Creative Cloud for three months and MS Office 2021. Reviexwing the ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 was a totally good experience as this system provides a double screen that straightaway helps in several workloads requiring two windows for simultaneous tasking, content consumption, gaming, and more. We must mention the quick key is quite considerable which enables us to create our hot keys and increase efficiency. This laptop is a package of multiple innovative features that enhance the overall work experience. On a scale of 5, DT rates it 4.5. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: ‚ÄúWe've Built Relationships With Over 8,000 Unique Partners‚Äù
Article Content: : ASIRT is a unique association with a genuine bonding amongst the members. The bonding goes beyond business and connects each other emotionally as well. The consortium concept within ASIRT gives the members to further deepen the bonding amongst the members. They are active participant in every activity whether it is fun, sports, arts, knowledge, spiritual practices etc. It‚Äôs a pleasure to be part of ASIRT, and I‚Äôm proud to be a key sponsor for 'The Synergy Biz Conclave 2024' ‚Äîit‚Äôs truly an honor for me. : I am a first-generation entrepreneur and have been honest and driven. While business is important, I focus more on how I can grow as a person. Business, profitability, and making a living will follow naturally. I‚Äôm happy to have built something from the ground up, starting from zero. Also, I am looking far beyond this business as well. :¬† Yes, my son completed his MBA from NMIMS, and has joined Bluecom to support the growth of our dream company. Since the industry is going through a transformation phase, I am happy to see him lead many efforts to grow further. Today, it‚Äôs all about a solution-centric approach. Customers no longer want just products; they want comprehensive solutions. This shift is something I expect him to drive within the company. He has the bandwidth to keep up with the latest technology. He is grooming and learning new technologies and initiatives in the market to integrate with his existing portfolio of products. I am looking forward to him as we will reach to new heights under the leadership of the new generation.¬† : Without their support and confidence, Bluecom would not have reached where it is now. Distribution is Bluecom‚Äôs one of the strongest verticals. This is the comprehensive approach that we have reached in the distribution vertical this far. In a highly competitive market like Mumbai, where we focus on niche Lenovo products in distribution, we've managed to reach nearly 550 unique partners in a single quarter which is humungous. To date, we've built relationships with over 8,000 unique partners, demonstrating the kind of market coverage we have. We've been able to succeed because we don‚Äôt approach sales in the typical way. For instance, even after six months, if there's an issue with a product, we've offered reversals and ensured service is provided. We‚Äôre clearly on the right path, and I‚Äôm excited for what‚Äôs ahead. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Samsung Launches Affordable and Stylish Galaxy M05 Smartphone in India
Article Content: Samsung, announced the launch of Galaxy M05, a dynamic addition to its popular Galaxy M series. Made for those who seek outstanding camera capabilities and immersive viewing experience, Galaxy M05 offers a perfect blend of high-performance and affordability. ‚ÄúGalaxy M05 is designed for young consumers who demand more from their smartphones. With features like a 50MP dual camera, a long-lasting 5000mAh battery with 25W fast charging, and a stunning 6.7‚Äù HD+ display, the device promises an immersive entertainment and enhanced camera experience. With these stand out features, Galaxy M05 is sure to set a new benchmark among the entry-level smartphones,‚Äù said  . Galaxy M05 takes smartphone photography to the next level with its dual camera setup. The high-resolution 50MP wide-angle lens captures vibrant, detailed photos, even in low-light conditions with aperture F/1.8, while the 2MP depth-sensing camera delivers pictures with enhanced clarity. The 8MP front camera ensures your selfies are crisp and clear. Galaxy M05 features a massive 5000mAh battery that easily powers through long usage. Whether you are streaming, gaming, or binge watching, the 25W fast charging feature ensures you are back in action in no time. Galaxy M05 features a large 6.7‚Äù HD+ display which is perfect for binge-watching your favourite shows or scrolling through social media feeds. The expansive screen also ensures an immersive viewing experience, catering to the needs of tech-savvy Gen Z customers. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G85 processor, Galaxy M05 is built to handle demanding tasks with ease. The reliable processor allows for seamless multitasking, enabling users to run multiple apps without any lag. Galaxy M05 will be available in 4GB+64GB storage variant, expandable upto 1TB storage for those who need more space. The device comes in a sleek Mint Green colour, reflecting a quirky and modern design aesthetic. Galaxy M05 will be available on Amazon, Samsung.com and at select retail stores.  ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Christie Digital is Well-Equipped to Meet and Exceed The Evolving Demands of The Entertainment Industry
Article Content: Since 2014, we have proudly led the Indian market in high-brightness projection segment, consistently maintaining our position at the forefront with products that exceed 6000 lumens. Our journey in innovation doesn‚Äôt stop there; we are continuously advancing in the realm of direct view LED displays. To date, we have successfully completed over 200 installations across India, demonstrating our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. One of our most groundbreaking achievements is the introduction of our MicroTiles LED. This product represents a significant leap forward in direct view LED technology, offering unique features and unparalleled performance that set it apart in the industry. Our dedication to innovation and quality ensures that we not only meet but exceed the expectations of our clients, solidifying our reputation as a leader in high-brightness and direct view LED solutions in India. Today, we proudly offer what is possibly the largest range of DLP projectors available from any manufacturer, with units spanning from 5,000 to 50,000 lumens. However, our expertise extends far beyond projectors alone. We have distinguished ourselves by providing comprehensive integrated solutions that cater to diverse customer needs. Products like Pandoras Box, Terra, and Mystique exemplify our commitment to delivering turnkey solutions, solidifying Christie's reputation as a one-stop solutions provider. Projection technology continues to play a crucial role in immersive entertainment due to its unparalleled flexibility, seamlessly adapting to both indoor and outdoor environments. Looking ahead, we envision an even tighter integration of projectors with advanced content management and processing solutions, such as our Pandoras Box. This product is specifically designed for immersive environments, ensuring a cohesive and captivating experience for audiences. By combining our extensive range of high-performance projectors with our cutting-edge integrated solutions, we are well-equipped to meet and exceed the evolving demands of the entertainment industry. Projectors are becoming smaller in size but able to output higher lumens, powered by various illumination technologies such as RGB pure laser that pushes the boundaries of color reproduction, brightness, resolution, image uniformity, installation versatility, and operational lifetime. This makes projection technology ideal for the creation of unparalleled shared experiences. We are also seeing greater integration with powerful software tools to simplify the deployment process for live events. Our Christie Mystique automated camera-based alignment software is a case in point. It enables users to quickly install, align, calibrate and maintain multi-projection systems. Additionally, projection technology is increasingly being integrated with AR and VR to create immersive environments. This trend is particularly significant in sectors such as education, training, entertainment, and retail, where it enhances the user experience by blending physical and digital worlds. At the same time, with growing environmental concerns, there is a push towards more energy-efficient and eco-friendly projector designs. Christie projectors are designed with sustainability in mind and the Christie Griffyn 4K50-RGB pure laser projector is a good example. Even though it has a high brightness output of 50,000 lumens, it‚Äôs also the most energy-efficient laser projector available today in its class, generating an incredible 15.9 lumens per watt. Comparable projectors in the same class only deliver an average of 10 lumens per watt. Christie will continue to embrace continuous innovation, prioritize customer-centricity, and adopt sustainable practices. We will also maintain our efforts in investing in R&D to advance technologies like RGB pure laser projection, and direct-view LED. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Commvault Report Reveals Increased Investment in Cyber Resilience by Breached Organizations
Article Content: Commvault, released new critical insights from its¬†2024 Cyber Recovery Readiness¬†Report. This global survey of 1,000 security and IT professionals across 11 countries,¬†reveals¬†interesting behavior changes for organizations that have been breached versus those that have not. The¬†Commvault¬†survey, done in collaboration with GigaOm, shows that organizations that have endured cyber incidents in the past don't want to get burned again. Consequently, they often reassess and invest in cyber resilience and recovery strategies in very meaningful ways. According to the survey: Investments in cyber resilience increase:¬†Organizations that have been breached spend nearly 30% more on cybersecurity measures than those that haven't. More attention is given to understanding data risk profiles:¬†Breached organizations are nearly 2.5 times more likely to prioritize understanding their data risk profiles, which highlight data types and relative levels of risk. Cyber readiness testing is prioritized:¬†Breached organizations conduct more testing to find gaps in their cyber preparedness plans. Twenty percent of organizations that haven't been breached do not test their recovery plan at all, that number drops to just 2% for organizations that have been breached. The impact of these added investments and focus on cyber resilience is significant. According to the survey, breached organizations that have invested in comprehensive cyber recovery plans recover 41% faster than their less-prepared counterparts. In terms of specific recovery times, breached organizations state that they are 32% more likely to recover within 48 hours compared to those that have not been breached ‚Äì a much better outcome than the recovery times noted by other respondents, which could be three weeks or more. This reduced downtime can translate to significant savings, both in terms of direct financial losses and the preservation of customer trust and brand reputation. "We've all heard the expression hindsight is 20/20, and that could not be more applicable when it comes to the findings of this survey," said¬† . "Our survey shows that the most resilient organizations are those that continuously test and refine their recovery strategies, learning from each incident to strengthen their defenses. It's this proactive mindset, rather than reactive spending, that makes the difference." Much like health insurance, where the cost of coverage often far outweighs the potential expenses of medical emergencies, cyber recovery readiness serves a similar purpose. The¬†report¬†underscores that the costs of being breached ‚Äì ranging from operational disruption to regulatory fines ‚Äì far exceed the expenses of proactive cyber resilience measures. "The findings should be a call to action for all organizations, not just those that have been breached," said¬† . "Cyber threats are constantly evolving, and so too must the strategies to counter them. It's about adopting a holistic approach to cyber resilience that integrates people, processes, and technology, ensuring readiness at every level." In addition to these findings,¬†Commvault¬†and GigaOm were able to pinpoint five key capabilities, also called resiliency markers, that when deployed together, helped companies recover faster from cyberattacks and experience fewer breaches compared to companies that did not follow the same path. These five resiliency markers emerged after data analysis teams combed through the same survey results across a range of topics including: how often companies were breached, what resilience technologies were (or were not) deployed, and how rapidly businesses were able to recover data and resume normal operations. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: AI and Automation Drive 50% Faster Software Development, OutSystems and KPMG Survey Reveals
Article Content: As the reach of¬†artificial intelligence (AI)¬†expands, IT leaders are exploring new use cases for technology used throughout the¬†software¬†development lifecycle (SDLC), according to a new survey launched today titled ‚ÄúAI in¬†software¬†development: Exploring opportunities and uncertainties‚Äù by¬†OutSystems, a global leader transforming how companies innovate through¬†software, and¬†KPMG, a multinational professional services network. The research surveyed 555¬†software¬†executives around the world whose companies span IT consultancy services, manufacturing, banking, financial services and insurance among others. 84 percent of respondents reported that their organizations first began to incorporate AI technologies in their SDLCs between six months to five years ago, with the earliest adopters primarily being IT services companies. Across regions, EMEA and North America remain roughly on equal footing, while APAC is steadily catching up. The findings show that testing, quality assurance, and security vulnerability detection are by far the most widely adopted use cases for AI in¬†software¬†development. Nonetheless,¬†generative AI (GenAI)¬†is set to transform the industry by significantly enhancing these processes and introducing unprecedented capabilities. Early adopters are planning to increase their use of AI in other stages of the SDLC, such as user interface design, code generation, DevOps optimization, and application maintenance. Nearly all respondents are planning to increase their investment in AI-augmented SDLC management over the next two years, indicating that AI will play a central role in¬†driving¬†innovation and competitive advantage in the¬†software¬†industry. ‚ÄúAI is redefining the impossible,‚Äù said Paulo Rosado, CEO and founder at OutSystems. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm laser-focused on helping teams compress multi-year legacy modernization projects into just a few months. The latest AI disruptions have brought us the potential to compress these development timelines into even shorter and¬†faster¬†projects. With AI, historically impossible transformation projects are not only possible but easier, cheaper, and¬†faster¬†to accomplish.‚Äù ‚ÄúRight now, the developer‚Äôs role is shifting from code writer to code reviewer,‚Äù said Rodrigo Coutinho, Co-founder and AI Project Manager at OutSystems. ‚ÄúLarge language models (LLMs) are a big help, but they still make mistakes. But as these models evolve, and trust in the resulting code improves, the developer‚Äôs role will be more akin to that of an orchestrator and acceptance tester of AI-generated outputs.‚Äù Despite being a nascent technology a couple of years ago, the report found that confidence in the quality of AI-generated code has risen substantially‚Äîhalf of respondents said that the implementation of AI has improved¬†software¬†quality, enhanced decision-making, and increased efficiency in¬†software¬†testing and quality assurance. But confidence is also paired with risk awareness surrounding tech debt in the form of orphan code and hallucinations, a lack of context for an organization‚Äôs specific coding needs, and scalability concerns. With strategy baked into AI in SDLC processes, 56% of respondents said they experienced or expected to experience a higher quality of applications, with fewer bugs and improved performance. ¬† The AI opportunity is undeniably huge, but its wider adoption in other areas of the SDLC beyond¬†software¬†testing and vulnerability detection still face some barriers. Chief among these are data privacy and security concerns (56% of respondents) and regulatory and compliance challenges (42%). Moreover, 38% of executives cite difficulties integrating generative AI into existing workflows as the primary barrier to adoption. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a lot of speculation on what will change with the rise of GenAI,‚Äù said Michael Harper, Managing Director at KPMG U.S. ‚ÄúWhile there will be challenges, those with effective change management initiatives will reskill and upskill their workforces, leading to AI and jobs evolving in tandem.‚Äù The speed and sprawl of AI, namely GenAI, is paving the way for an increase in investments for nearly all respondents. But risks concerning the reliability of AI-generated code persist, though they can be mitigated with existing approaches, such as user acceptance testing, unit testing, and regression testing. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs up to the developer working with AI to guarantee the quality of the deliverables, but this becomes way more efficient with AI,‚Äù said Coutinho. ‚ÄúAI is, in fact, a great partner in creating tests in synthetic data.‚Äù Other oft-cited concerns were the limited availability of skilled personnel and difficulties integrating GenAI into existing tech stacks and workflows. Fears of job losses are high as well, with 89% of respondents claiming that certain roles will be eliminated by AI. This falls in line with a broader industry trend over the last couple of years. However, in the longer term, AI may well create more jobs than it displaces, resulting in a new type of developer, equipped with specialized AI skill sets. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Oracle‚Äôs Latest Dynamic Skills Capabilities Enhance Talent Strategy and Decision-Making
Article Content: Oracle announced a new open skills architecture within¬†Oracle Dynamic Skills¬†that helps organizations to develop, curate, and execute an enterprise-wide skills-based talent strategy. Part of¬†Oracle Fusion Cloud Human Capital Management (HCM), Oracle Dynamic Skills helps organizations‚Äîregardless of where they are on their skills journey‚Äîbetter understand and leverage the skills of their employees, expand access to talent, and make smarter workforce decisions. ‚ÄúSkills are quickly becoming the primary metric to understanding the capabilities of an organization. Having a skills-based talent strategy can help an organization uncover critical work and workforce insights, tap into more diverse talent, and maximize performance. But many organizations don‚Äôt know where to start in their skills journey,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúWith Oracle Dynamic Skills, we are making it easy for our customers to manage their skills data‚Äîwhether they are just getting started on their skills journey or looking to enhance their existing skills data. By providing the intelligence, applications, and architecture, we enable our customers to better align their skills with business priorities, optimize their workforce, and future-proof their organization in a rapidly evolving job market.‚Äù Oracle Dynamic Skills enables organizations to manage skills data at its core, alongside its work and people data, for improved insights and data-driven decisions. With a complete view of skills woven into processes across the enterprise, an organization can optimize its workforce performance by making better internal hires, fostering career development, enhancing planning and budgeting, improving skills-based scheduling, and developing highly skilled employees aligned with business needs. The new open skills architecture within Oracle Dynamic Skills includes: AI-powered bespoke skills inventory:¬†Enables HR leaders to gain a complete catalog of their organization‚Äôs skills that can be modified or refined, and is always kept up to date. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization enhance the speed and accuracy of skills insights by improving data consistency and relevance. AI-powered data enrichment:¬†Enables HR leaders to combine enriched skills data with data from across the enterprise and third-party sources. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization gain more value from the tools and data they already have, and benefit from AI features that expand skills insights to better align talent with business priorities. Skills library:¬†Enables HR leaders to jumpstart their skills journey with an extensive pre-populated skills library to augment existing skills data or serve as a starting point. As a result, HR leaders can help theliir organization accelerate adoption of a skills-based talent strategy and improve workforce decision-making. Skills data analysis:¬†Enables HR leaders to analyze their workforce‚Äôs skills strengths, gaps, and trends with flexible and easy-to-use business intelligence tools. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization nurture the right skills and quickly fill skills gaps. Integrated skills intelligence:¬†Enables HR leaders to seamlessly leverage third-party skills data and labor market analytics, such as those from¬†Lightcast, a provider of trusted global labor market data, analytics, and expert guidance. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization expand insights and make more informed talent decisions. Skills curation and management:¬†Enables HR leaders to browse, add, and modify skills with intuitive tools to further refine and personalize their skills library. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization better manage and define their skills needs. Multiple language support:¬†Enables HR leaders to engage with skills data in any of the 30 delivered languages, as well as translate skills data in additional languages as needed for their global organization. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization adopt workforce insights across its entire global operations and further enhance workforce performance. ‚ÄúBuilding a strong skills foundation is a top priority for us at Navy Federal Credit Union. As the way we work ‚Äì and the skills needed to do so ‚Äì continues to rapidly evolve, it‚Äôs important that we have visibility into our organization‚Äôs skills so that we can easily identify specific skills needs, maximize workforce performance, and continue delivering exceptional service to our members,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúWith Oracle Dynamic Skills, we‚Äôll be able to better understand and leverage the skills of our organization, gain critical workforce insights, and make more informed talent decisions. We are eager to take advantage of the new capabilities being introduced.‚Äù Built for the cloud, Oracle Cloud HCM is a complete solution connecting every human resource process from hire to retire across an organization with a native employee experience platform and embedded AI capabilities. By connecting all employee data on a single platform, HR teams have access to a single source of truth to help inform their people strategy. In addition, embedded AI acts as an advisor to help analyze workforce data, generate content, and augment or automate processes to help improve business operations. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: ‚ÄúMannat Writing Board Software Is Going To Revolutionize The Industry‚Äù
Article Content: We have been contributing to the education industry for a while now, and it was our vision from the beginning to develop our own writing board software with all the latest features. This idea has been with us since we started the operations of our company almost five years ago. Today, I am very happy to say that it has finally been accomplished. This is our contribution to the nation, demonstrating that we are not dependent on any other country for software solutions; we have created our own. 'Mannat' Writing Board software is going to revolutionize the industry as it is the first software integrated with inbuilt content for everything. Currently, we have added NCERT content and plan to include ICSE board content and other curricula. We also aim to convert the content videos into 14 regional languages, making it accessible to a wider audience. Our goal is to make digital teaching available on all panels so that everyone can benefit from it. Over the past 25 years, since the advent of smart classes, there has always been a challenge of using different software for content and writing boards, causing confusion among teachers. With five years of hard work, we have finally integrated a whiteboard with content, making it user-friendly and easy for teachers to use. Before launching, we took feedback from over 200 to 500 teachers by showing them free demos and organizing classes to understand their needs and preferences. Based on their feedback, we have included mathematical tools, chemistry tools, physics tools, images, videos, books, PPTs, 3D images, and more. Previously, various software offered limited features, but now we have consolidated everything into one software, making it a win-win situation for us. As industry leaders, we wanted a leading personality to represent our brand. We didn't want someone who plays a secondary or tertiary role; we wanted a hero. Abhay Deol perfectly fits this image. Additionally, he was my daughter's choice as well, which made the decision even more meaningful. We initially discussed the idea with him last year, and after waiting for a year, we are finally able to bring this collaboration. This product is not only compatible with our hardware, but anyone, any brand, can purchase and use it with their hardware. The idea is that the future battle lies in software, not hardware. While hardware is common among people, software presents a challenge. We have taken the initiative, as we always do, because we are the leaders and must act as such. Others had an equal opportunity to do so, but no one took advantage of it. We believe we have been blessed to do it. The first version is already available, and every month, users will receive a new update. We aim to achieve a market share of 30 to 40% in next one year. In August, we are launching the Android version as well, so anyone can use it on Android or Windows. Initially, we are collaborating with our partners and all the brands associated with us. We provide them with our software, which they can sell under their own branding. We are also offering this as a white-label solution. I believe that within the next year, most brands will be associated with our software and will adopt it. Just like in all government projects where the government has mandated the use of Indian software and products, they require software for both Android and Windows platforms, and both should be the same. I think we will be the only company in India to have this capability. No other company offers software for both Windows and Android with the same specifications and features. While many Chinese companies are doing this, they face restrictions from the government. Therefore, I believe that India will be the only country where a manufacturer will have both Android and Windows versions with the same specs and features. The digital revolution is underway, and we are committed to contributing our best efforts to it. We are not leading a revolution but are merely playing a part in it, striving to add our numbers and efforts to the cause. The success of our contribution relies on the support and love from people and the guidance of God. I promise to India that this year, we will have India's largest IT manufacturing facility in Punjab. We have already acquired the land, and the construction work is underway. This year, we promise to have the largest manufacturing unit in India, located in Punjab. We have already initiated many steps in this direction, and I believe we will be able to start the factory around Diwali. This will be our gift to India. We are also exporting our software application. We have orders from Dubai, and many customers from Dubai are interested. Even our vendors, from whom we buy raw materials, are willing to buy the software under their name. However, my idea was to start from India. Once the software gains popularity in India, we can then expand to other countries. We have already developed a website for online purchases. People can buy online from our Dubai office. We are open to customization requests as well, and we can tailor the software to meet specific needs. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Huawei Unveils $2,800 Tri-Fold Smartphone to Challenge Apple‚Äôs iPhone 16 Launch
Article Content: Huawei Technologies unveiled its latest $2,800 tri-fold smartphone on Tuesday, aiming to strengthen its position in the world‚Äôs largest smartphone market and draw attention away from Apple, just hours after Apple's latest iPhone 16 launch. The Chinese technology company exhibited the latest Mate XT, a three-way foldable handset such as an accordion screen door, in the Shenzhen tech hub launch ceremony. The smartphone has already received over 4 million pre-orders that required no deposit, as per the company‚Äôs website. According to research organization IDC, the entire global market for foldable phones, in the second quarter, was around 4 million units. The world‚Äôs first triple foldable phone has arrived. Breaking boundaries and redefining possibilities. Delivering an immersive and dynamic experience completely unlike anything you have ever imagined.      "Today we bring you a product that everyone can think of but could not make. Our team has been working hard for five years and has never given up," Richard Yu, Huawei executive director stated at the launch. "Today we will once again rewrite the history of the industry, turn science fiction into reality, and lead a new era of folding devices." AI functions are bolstered with in-house Kylin chips of Huawei, he added. The new phone features an AI assistant alongside translation, text summary, and editing functions, along with AI-boosted image editing capabilities such as removing unwanted parts from the photos, Yu said. The highly anticipated launch follows right hours after Apple¬†introduced its latest lineup - the AI-supported iPhone 16, both smartphones are due to up on sale on 20  September. The Mate XT is available in red and black colours and boasts a 10.2-inch display screen. The company claims that its 3.6mm width makes it the slimmest foldable phone in the world and also has a keyboard attached easy to fit in the pocket. The 256-gigabyte model is priced at 19,999 yuan, with higher memory options available at 21,999 yuan and 23,999 yuan, as per Reuters. The launch, following a string of successful smartphone releases, highlights Huawei's resilience in overcoming U.S. sanctions and strengthens its position over Apple in China, where consumers have criticized the iPhone 16 for lacking AI features. Apple is still in search of an AI partner in China to enhance its iPhone 16 series, while its AI software, Apple Intelligence, will not be available in Chinese languages until next year. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Title: AWS Selects Seven Indian Startups for Global Generative AI Accelerator Program
Article Content: Amazon Web Services (AWS) announced that¬†seven¬†generative AI¬†startups¬†from India have been selected for the¬†AWS¬†Global Generative AI Accelerator¬†program. The selected¬†Indian¬†startups‚Äî¬† ,¬† ,¬† ,¬† ,¬† ¬† , and¬† , are among the 80 companies selected by¬†AWS¬†worldwide for their innovative use of AI and their global growth ambitions. The¬†Indian¬†cohort also represents the highest number of¬†startups¬†selected from a country in the Asia-Pacific region for the¬†AWS¬†Global Generative AI Accelerator program.¬†The selected¬†startups¬†will also be invited to¬†AWS‚Äôs premier annual event, re:Invent, in Las Vegas, where they will showcase their solutions on a global stage. As part of¬†AWS‚Äôs US$230 million commitment¬†to accelerate the creation of applications worldwide,¬†the¬†AWS¬†Generative AI Accelerator program provides¬†startups, especially early-stage companies, with¬†AWS¬†credits, mentorship, and education to further their use of AI and ML technologies. Selected¬†startups¬†will gain access to¬†AWS¬†compute, storage, and database technologies, as well as¬†AWS¬†Trainium¬†and¬†AWS¬†Inferentia2, energy-efficient AI chips that offer high performance at the lowest cost. The credits can also be used on¬†Amazon SageMaker, a fully managed service that helps companies build and train their own foundation models (FMs), as well as to access models and tools to easily and securely build generative AI applications through¬†Amazon Bedrock. The 10-week program matches participants with both business and technical mentors based on their industry, and chosen¬†startups¬†will receive up to US$1 million each in¬†AWS¬†credits to help them build, train, test, and launch their generative AI solutions. Participants will also have access to technology and technical sessions from program presenting partner NVIDIA, a pioneer in accelerated computing. ‚ÄúWe are thrilled to announce the¬†seven¬†Indian¬†startups¬†that have been selected for the¬†AWS¬†global generative AI accelerator program. The¬†Indian¬†cohort represents the highest number of¬†startups¬†selected for the accelerator in the Asia-Pacific and Japan region. The selected¬†startups¬†are at the forefront of tapping into the transformative potential of generative AI to build innovative solutions,‚Äù said¬† . "At¬†AWS, our $230 million commitment and global expansion of the generative AI accelerator reflects our continued focus on supporting¬†startups¬†to develop, build and scale their unique ideas using generative AI. We are excited to witness the pioneering advancements that the selected¬†startups¬†will bring to solve complex challenges in India¬†and¬†worldwide." In India,¬†AWS¬†continues to support generative AI¬†startups¬†through initiatives such as¬† a collaborative pop-up space recently hosted in Bangalore to promote innovation in AI. It offered visitors a unique platform to gain insights and explore real-world applications of generative AI across industries. According to PitchBook Data, Inc, 1,813 AI and ML companies have raised funding in India with over US$82 billion in investments to date in 2024. However,¬†only 35% of generative AI companies globally have offices in locations outside their headquarter country, revealing that more can be done to support¬†startups¬†realize their growth ambitions. ‚ÄúAsia-Pacific-based generative AI companies have raised over $2.5 billion in 2024, more than the prior three years combined,‚Äù said¬† , Senior Analyst, Emerging Technology Research, PitchBook. ‚ÄúDevelopers and¬†startups¬†are seizing the opportunity to train custom models based on unique cultural and linguistic data. Additionally, leading AI researchers are working on a diversity of transformer models in multimodal domains including 3D images, interactive media, and synthetic voice. The future of AI applications will rely on specialized model architectures and¬†startups¬†will need world-class cloud infrastructure to fulfill their vision.‚Äù Here is the list of¬†Indian¬†startups¬†selected for¬†AWS¬†Global Generative AI Accelerator program.¬†Click here¬†to see the complete list of 80¬†startups¬†selected worldwide for the accelerator program. Convrse develops an AI-based tool to optimize complex 3D objects or scenes and make them web or real-time ready. House of Models leverages LLM and Diffuser models to generate digital content for brands and businesses, including images, videos, and product descriptions. | Neural Garage uses generative AI to sync actors' lips with dubbed audio in film, streaming, advertising, and broadcasting, offering seamless viewing without compromising the cinematic feel. ¬†|¬† Orbo.ai uses generative AI to provide hyper-personalization and contextual search solutions for the beauty and personal care industries. ¬†|¬† Phot.ai is a comprehensive AI-powered platform that simplifies photo editing and graphic design through a wide range of tools designed to help e-commerce sellers optimize their workflows. ¬†|¬† Unscript AI uses generative AI to create studio-quality videos with real or virtual actors, without the cost or time involved with physical shooting. Zocket simplifies digital advertising using generative AI for ad creation, targeting, and analytics, making it easy for businesses of all sizes to manage and optimize campaigns ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt.
