Zakonski osnov obrade podataka o liƒçnosti je va≈° pristanak kao lica na koje se podaci odnose, izvr≈°enje ugovorne obaveze kao i legitimni interes rukovaoca iz ƒçlana 12 Zakona o za≈°titi podataka o liƒçnosti (dalje: ZZPL). Unutar na≈°e Kompanije, pristup podacima, koje ste nam stavili na raspolaganje, imaju samo oni sektori, odnosno oni zaposleni kojima su isti neophodni za ispunjenje svrhe za za koju su podaci o liƒçnosti prikupljeni 
Kompanija, kao deo grupacije privrednih dru≈°tava, mo≈æe prosleƒëivati podatke svojim povezanim licima, kada je to neophodno i uvek u okviru na≈°eg legitimnog interesa i definisane svrhe. 
Novoosnovani entiteti ili entitet sticaoca vlasni≈°tva nad Kompanijom, ukoliko je Kompanija ukljuƒçena u spajanje, pripajanje, kupovinu, prodaju udela ili drugu statusnu promenu. 
Na≈°i partneri, koji za Kompaniju vr≈°e odreƒëene poslove obrade kao obraƒëivaƒçi, poput eksternih saradnika koji nam pru≈æaju odreƒëene usluge, kao i softverskih kompanija koje izraƒëuju i odr≈æavaju softvere u kojima se pohranjuju podaci. 
(marketing, analitika, tehniƒçka podr≈°ka i odr≈æavanje) 
Izuzetno, podaci o liƒçnosti se mogu dostavljati i nadle≈ænim dr≈æavnim organima, ukoliko je to zakonska obaveza Rukovaoca, i to samo u meri u kojoj je to neophodno za ostvarivanje konkretne zakonske obaveze. 
Bilo kojem drugom primaocu kada je razumno neophodno, npr. u sluƒçaju opasnosti po ≈æivot. 
Svi primaoci su obavezni da preduzmu odgovarajuƒáe tehniƒçke, organizacione i kadrovske mere kako bi za≈°titili va≈°e liƒçne podatke. U situacijama kada smo mi rukovaoci i obradu podataka po na≈°em nalogu radi neko treƒáe pravno lice kao obraƒëivaƒç, ugovorom reguli≈°emo odnose sa obraƒëivaƒçima, kojima se reguli≈°u svi bitni aspekti obrade podataka o liƒçnosti kao i mere za≈°tite. oju su podaci o liƒçnosti prikupljeni, a kojima je u opisu posla obrada podataka o liƒçnosti. Va≈°i podaci mogu biti preneti na≈°im pouzdanim partnerima koji obraƒëuju liƒçne podatke u na≈°e ime, ukljuƒçujuƒái provajdere IT, marketin≈°ke agencije kao i druge na≈°e pouzdane partnere. U sluƒçaju prenosa podataka, mi ƒáemo zahtevati da na≈°i pouzdani partneri ƒçuvaju tajnost i bezbednost podataka kao i da sprovedu odgovarajuƒáe mere kako bi se obezbedila za≈°tita podataka o liƒçnosti. 
Mi mo≈æemo preneti podatke o liƒçnosti u jurisdikcije koje ne obuhvataju mesto prebivali≈°ta korisnika, ali mi to radimo iskljuƒçivo u svrhe opisane u ovoj Politici privatnosti. Kada prenosimo podatke o liƒçnosti u druge jurisdikcije, mi to radimo u skladu sa zahtevima va≈æeƒáeg zakona. 
Prenos podataka izvan EEA 
Na≈°i partneri su registrovani uglavnom u dr≈æavama Evropskog ekonomskog podruƒçja (EEA) ili u ≈†vajcarskoj, odnosno u dr≈æavama koje ispunjavaju odgovarajuƒái nivo za≈°tite podataka o liƒçnosti. Neki na≈°i pouzdani partneri, npr. Google, nalaze se izvan EEA. U vezi sa prenosom va≈°ih podataka izvan EEA, partneri garantuju da pru≈æaju garanciju visokog nivoa za≈°tite liƒçnih podataka, ≈°to podrazumeva kori≈°ƒáenje Standardnih ugovornih klauzula odobrenih od strane Evropske komisije za preno≈°enje u zemlje koje nisu oznaƒçene kao zemlje koje pru≈æaju adekvatan nivo za≈°tite, koje defini≈°u na≈°e visoke standarde za obradu podataka o liƒçnosti. Standardne ugovorne klauzule su dostupne na mnogim jezicima na sledeƒáem  . Liƒçne podatke korisnika zadr≈æavamo ne du≈æe nego ≈°to je potrebno u pogledu svrhe za koje su prikupljeni podaci ili za koje se ti podaci dalje obraƒëuju. 
Kriterijumi za odreƒëivanje vremena tokom koga ƒçuvamo ove podatke su: 
Neophodnost zadr≈æavanja uskladi≈°tenih liƒçnih podataka s ciljem pru≈æanja usluga uspostavljenih sa korisnikom. 
Da bi se za≈°titio legitimni interes Rukovalaca. 
Postojanje specifiƒçnih zakonskih obaveza koje obradu i srodno skladi≈°tenje zahtevaju u odreƒëenom vremenskom periodu. Va≈°i podaci ƒáe biti obraƒëivani do: 
- u sluƒçaju davanja saglasnosti do trenutka opoziva saglasnosti za obradu, ograniƒçenja ili druge radnje kojom se ograniƒçava data saglasnost, 
- u sluƒçaju potrebe da se Va≈°i podaci koriste za realizaciju ugovora, do isteka trajanja ugovorne obaveze, 
- ako je osnov za obradu podataka na≈° legitimni interes, i to do podno≈°enja prigovora ili opoziva saglasnosti, 
- za poreske i raƒçunovodstvene svrhe u meri i u roku, koji je u skladu sa drugim va≈æeƒáim propisima. Preduzeli smo odgovarajuƒáe tehniƒçke i organizacione mere da za≈°titimo liƒçne podatke korisnika od nenamerne ili nezakonite obrade, tako ≈°to smo obezbedili: 
Da liƒçni podaci korisnika budu za≈°tiƒáeni od neovla≈°ƒáenog pristupa ili uno≈°enja izmena. 
Da se saƒçuva poverljivost liƒçnih podataka korisnika. 
ƒåuvanje raspolo≈æivosti liƒçnih podataka korisnika. 
Dobavljaƒçi i klijenti dobijaju instrukcije o tome kako da ƒçuvaju liƒçne podatke korisnika. 
Stvarno kr≈°enje ili sumnja da je do≈°lo do kr≈°enja bezbednosti podataka se prijavljuje u skladu sa va≈æeƒáim zakonom. 
Svi liƒçni podaci skladi≈°te se u bazi podataka koja se nalazi na posebnom serveru za ƒçiji pristup i rukovanje je potrebno posebno ovla≈°ƒáenje. Svaki korisnik platforme ima moguƒánost da u bilo kom trenutku zatra≈æi brisanje svojih liƒçnih podataka u skladu sa Op≈°tom Uredbom o za≈°titi podataka o liƒçnosti (General Data Protection Regulation ‚Äì Regulation ((EU) 2016/679 ‚Äì GDPR) i Zakonom o za≈°titi podataka o liƒçnosti Republike Srbije, ≈°to podrazumeva brisanje email adrese, lozinke i svih ostavljenih liƒçnih podataka korisnika na nivou baze podataka. 
U svakom trenutku iz opravdanih razloga, Rukovalac mo≈æe obrisati liƒçne podatke korisnika uz slanje obave≈°tenja korisniku u elektronskom formatu da su njegovi liƒçni podaci izbrisani iz Joberty Technologies doo baze podataka. Dodatno, ukoliko je korisnik kompanijskog naloga svojevoljno ostavio i kontakt telefon i ime i prezime kontakt osobe i ti podaci na zahtev korisnika kompanijskog naloga ƒáe biti obrisani iz baze podataka. U skladu sa odredbama Op≈°te Uredbe o za≈°titi liƒçnih podataka (Uredbe Evropskog parlamenta i Saveta (EU) 2016/679 koja se primenjuje od 25.05.2018. godine) i Zakona o za≈°titi podataka o liƒçnosti Republike Srbije ("Sl. glasnik RS", br. 87/2018), imate sledeƒáa prava u odnosu na obradu liƒçnih podataka sa na≈°e strane, ukljuƒçujuƒái i obradu liƒçnih podataka i od strane na≈°ih pouzdanih partnera: 
- pravo pristupa svojim podacima, ukljuƒçujuƒái i dobijanje kopije podataka, 
- pravo na zahtevanje ispravke podataka, 
- pravo na brisanje podataka, 
- pravo na podno≈°enje ≈æalbe nadzornom organu za za≈°titu liƒçnih podataka, 
- pravo ograniƒçavanja obrade podataka. U svakom od ovih sluƒçajeva korisnici mogu da po≈°alju email na  , ako ≈æele da iskoriste neko od svojih prava ili ukoliko imaju dodatna pitanja u vezi sa privatno≈°ƒáu, a koja se mogu odnositi na: 
Pristup - korisnici imaju pravo da zahtevaju pristup svojim liƒçnim podacima koje ƒçuvamo i da saznaju detalje o tome koje podatke prikupljamo i za koju svrhu koristimo, kao i druge informacije predviƒëene Zakonom. 
Ispravka - mi preduzimamo primerene mere da obezbedimo da informacije koje o korisnicima ƒçuvamo budu taƒçne i kompletne, ali korisnici mogu zatra≈æiti da se one dopune ili isprave. 
Brisanje - u nekim sluƒçajevima, korisnici imaju pravo da tra≈æe da se liƒçni podaci izbri≈°u, kao na primer, kada ne postoji vi≈°e prvobitna potreba da se ƒçuvaju liƒçni podaci koje smo prikupili ili kada povlaƒçite svoju saglasnost. Meƒëutim, to se mora uskladiti sa drugim ƒçiniocima. Na primer, mo≈æda neƒáemo moƒái da ispunimo va≈° zahtev zbog odreƒëenih zakonskih ili regulatornih obaveza.

Title: Priƒçe o pesmama: Instrumentalni okean Kornelija Kovaƒça, dve godine od kada nas je napustio veliki maestro - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Dok pi≈°em ovaj tekst u mislima mi prolaze svi oni trenuci u kojima smo razgovarali, pa i saraƒëivali. Njegov autorski opus zaista je ogroman i o tome sam vi≈°e puta pisao. U ovom tekstu poku≈°aƒáu da vas podsetim na segment njegovog stvarala≈°tva koji je ovda≈°njoj publici svakako manje poznat, ali je zaista izuzetan, a i njemu samom bio je jako va≈æan. Ako govorimo o domaƒáoj instrumentalnoj muzici koju su stvarali rok muziƒçari, svakako stoji da ona nije lako pronalazila put do slu≈°alaca, a ako i jeste, to su uglavnom bili gitarski instrumentali. Setimo se recimo kompozicija kao ≈°to su "Dinamit" Josipa Boƒçeka, "Ulazak u harem" R.M. Toƒçka ili "Jednoj ≈æeni" Zlatka Manojloviƒáa. Takoƒëe, tu su i mnoge sjajne obrade iz ovda≈°njeg etno nasleƒëa, poput "Aber dojde Donke" grupe Leb i Sol, "Zajdi, zajdi" od Smaka, ili izvanredne Toƒçkove solo partije koju je doneo u kompoziciji "Ukor". Kasnije su neki od ovih gitarista objavili i svoje instrumentalne albume, a meƒëu prvima su to uradili R.M. Toƒçak (1977.), a takoƒëe i Zlatko Manojloviƒá (1980.). O gotovo svim gore navedenim kompozicijama pisao sam tekstove, ali svakako ne treba smetnuti s uma da postoji i izuzetan instrumentalni, autorski opus, koji su u onim zlatnim danima rok muzike ostavili iza sebe neki od na≈°ih najpoznatijih klavijaturista. Jedan od prvih solo albuma objavio je Tihomir Pop Asanoviƒá ("Majko zemljo" 1974.), ali s obzirom da je taj LP prete≈æno vokalni (izuzev kompozicija "Berlin I" i "Berlin II"),¬† Kornelije Kovaƒç svakako spada u red onih pionira koji su se odva≈æili da krenu u vode instrumentalne muzike Za≈°to ka≈æem odva≈æio? Mo≈æda je najbolje obja≈°njenje za to dao sam Kornelije u jednom intervjuu koji sam vodio s njim: ¬†(iz knjige "Gramofonske priƒçe", autora Gorana ≈Ωivanoviƒáa) Da je ovo taƒçno, svedoƒçi i ƒçinjenica da je mnogo vi≈°e onih koji su, nakon prestanka rada Korni grupe, upoznati sa Kornelijevim kompozitorskim radom za na≈°e tada veoma popularne pevaƒçe kao ≈°to su to recimo Zdravko ƒåoliƒá, Bisera Veletanliƒá, Zlatko Pejakoviƒá itd, nego sa njegovim solo ostvarenjima. U tekstu koji sledi podsetiƒáu vas na nekoliko kompozicije iz tog opusa. Ovo je prva ploƒça koju je Kornelije Kovaƒç objavio pod svojim imenom nakon razlaza Korni grupe. Seƒáam se da sam komoziciju "Okean" prvi put ƒçuo kada sam bio osmi razred. Bio sam naprosto oƒçaran. Toliko mi se svideo taj instrumental da sam odmah shvatio kako tu ploƒçu moram imati ≈°to pre. Kornelije je ovde po ko zna koji put pokazao koliki je majstor svog zanata. Iako se kompozicija "Okean" na≈°la na B strani ovog singla, tih godina mnogo ƒçe≈°ƒáe je emitovana na talasima radio stanica, mada ni A strana na kojoj je "Severni vetar", nije ni≈°ta lo≈°ija i zvuƒçi stvarno svetski. Ovo je za mene jedan od onih ƒçarobnih singlova iz sedamdesetih godina, ploƒça koja pokazuje kakvi talenti su stasavali u jednoj relativno maloj zemlji kao ≈°to je to Jugoslavija. Nakon ovog fantastiƒçnog singla, mnogi su oƒçekivali (meƒëu njima i ja) sledeƒái Kornelijev potez. U stvari ƒçekao se album. Do realizacije takve ideje nikada nije do≈°lo, a razlozi za to nisu bili do kraja jasni. Tada se govorkalo da je ƒçitav plan propao jer je Dado bio neodluƒçan, ƒças je hteo, ƒças nije, da se prikljuƒçi grupi. Meƒëutim, Dadovo mi≈°ljenje sasvim je drugaƒçije, ≈°to mi je i izneo u jednom razgovoru: (misli na gradove u kojima su ≈æiveli muziƒçari koji su trebali da sviraju u K2, op. autora) Interesantno je da ƒáe gotovo svi ƒçlanovi ove zami≈°ljene super grupe svirati na Kornelijevom prvom solo albumu. Dakle, tu su bili gitarista Josip Boƒçek, basista ƒåarli Novak, klavijaturisti Sloba Markoviƒá i Sanja Iliƒá, bubnjari Lazar To≈°iƒá i Ratko Divjak, dok su pevaƒçke deonice podelili Zvezdana Sterle, Nada ≈Ωgur i Oto Pestner.  Taj LP je u su≈°tini bio dobar, na njemu je bilo dosta vokalnih kompozicija, ali ruku na srce, ƒçini se da nije bilo neke koja bi mogla da povuƒçe ceo album. U jednom razgovoru upitao sam ga za≈°to je doneo takvu odluku, kada je ovde veƒá stekao ime vredno svakog po≈°tovanja, njegov odgovor bio je ovakav:  (iz knjige "Gramofonske priƒçe, autora Gorana ≈Ωivanoviƒáa) LP je kao i prethodni objavila izdavaƒçka kuƒáa PGP RTB i to je stvarno bila odliƒçno uraƒëena ploƒça. Na ploƒçi se nalazi i par sjajnih instrumentala poput "Scottish Bird", a tu je i instrumentalna verzija poznate pesme Korni grupe, "Put za istok". Tih godina slu≈°ao sam ga jako puno, jednostavno nisam mogao da prestanem. Iako je Kornelije i dalje objavljivao svoja solo ostvarenja, ja ƒáu u ovoj priƒçi upravo ovde stati. Sa ploƒçe"Sampled Moon"¬† gotovo da sam mogao odabrati bilo koju kompoziciju za ovaj prikaz, ipak, odluƒçio sam se za "Still Chicken" i "Anna F". Za prvu, mnogi koji su je ƒçuli uop≈°te i ne znaju da je iz opusa Kornelija Kovaƒça, dok je druga posveƒáena Ani Frank i jedina je kompozicija na albumu u kojoj je kori≈°ƒáen glas, ali u funkciji instrumenta. Tu deonicu otpevala je Kornelijeva ƒáerka Aleksandra koja je tada imala samo ƒçetrnaest godina. Meƒëutim, isto tako, mogao sam se odluƒçiti i za nestvarnu "Get It Right Boy", ili na primer "Cola-Kid", ili za vi≈°e nego sjajnu "Dancing On The White Beach". Interesantno je da je bilo zlobnika koji su tvrdili da je Kornelije inspiraciju za ovu poslednju prona≈°ao u kompoziciji "Get Out of Your Lazy Bed", koju je par godina ranije objavila britanska grupa Matt Bianco. Malo ≈°ta je delovalo tako opu≈°tajuƒáe i umirujuƒáe kao ova ploƒça. Bar je kod mene bilo tako. Na≈æalost, ako na YOU TUBE danas pogledate broj pregleda ovih kompozicija, razoƒçaraƒáete se. Ta brojka jedva da dosti≈æe nekoliko hiljada (izuzev kompozicije "Okean" koja ima ne≈°to vi≈°e"), Sreƒáom ima i onih, meƒëu koje ubrajam i sebe, kojima ti pregledi apsolutno ni≈°ta ne znaƒçe i na to se uop≈°te i ne obaziru. I da: Kornelije je pisao i sjajnu filmsku muziku, zatim ≈°pice za mnoge popularne televizijske i radio emisije, i tu takoƒëe ima sjajnih instrumentala, ali o svemu tome mo≈æda u nekoj od na≈°ih narednih priƒça. Title: Sveƒçano otvoren 20. Festival ‚Äû7 veliƒçanstvenih‚Äú u Mts dvorani - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
U petak 13. septembra sveƒçano je otvoren 20. festival evropskog dugometra≈ænog dokumentarnog filma ‚Äú7 veliƒçanstvenih‚Äù u Mts dvorani. Zoran Popoviƒá, direktor festivala ‚Äû7 veliƒçanstvenih‚Äú, na otvaranju je rekao: ‚ÄûPre dvadeset godina postojao je samo san o velikom sjajnom bioskopu, o velikom platnu, o fantastiƒçnim filmovima i veliƒçanstvenoj publici. Nakon 20 godina, svi smo zajedno u tom snu, koji je uspeo da se ostvari. Da li zato ≈°to smo ulo≈æili svu na≈°u snagu, trud i energiju da otvorimo ≈°iroko vrata filmovima koji su i u Evropi tek dolazili i najavljivali jedno novo poglavlje u istoriji filma; da li zato ≈°to smo imali podr≈°ku zaista sjajnih, veliƒçanstvenih evropskih dokumentarista i jednog izuzetnog Danca koji je gotovo postao Beograƒëanin, Tue Stin Milera; da li zato ≈°to je sve to spojila jedna veliƒçanstvena, evropska publika, koja voli dokumentarni film, bioskop, i u≈æiva u onome ≈°to je magija filma. Sve to zajedno, tokom dvadeset godina, stvaralo je legendu o festivalu, koju ≈°irom Evrope pronose eminentni evropski dokumentaristi, priƒçajuƒái o neƒçemu ≈°to gotovo da nikada u svojoj karijeri nisu sreli, a dogaƒëa se u Beogradu‚Äú. Tue Stin Miler, selektor festivala, ispriƒçao je priƒçu o imaginarnom susretu Hansa Kristijana Andersena i Nikole Tesle, i njihovom razgovoru o buduƒánosti pokretnih slika. ‚ÄûOni nisu vi≈°e ovde, ali pre neki dan sedeli su na jednom oblaku iznad Beograda. It is supposed to reflect the health of the listed universe of Indian companies, and hence the broader economy, in all market conditions. Officially called the Nifty50, the index is computed using the free float market capitalisation method, which is essentially the count of shares in active circulation in the market at any given point of time. The Nifty, just like BSE benchmark Sensex, is today used for benchmarking portfolios and returns of mutual fund schemes and launching index funds. The Nifty index was launched on April 22, 1996, with a base value of 1,000 counted from November 3, 1995. Live Nifty quotes are available on NSEIndia.com, ETMarkets.com and numerous other web platforms and TV channels at any point of time. The Nifty brand and indices are managed by the Mumbai-based India Index Services and Products Limited, IISL in short, which itself is a subsidiary of NSE. IISL has a three-tier governance structure comprising the board of directors, the index policy committee and the index maintenance sub-committee. IISL managed some 67 indices under the Nifty brand as of September 30, 2016. IISL rebalances the Nifty index semi-annually. The cut-off dates for the semi-annual review of the index are January 31 and July 31 each year. Average data for the six months ending the cut-off date is considered. The exchange notifies any change in the index four weeks before such changes take effect. There are defined eligibility criteria for selection of Nifty constituent stocks. The liquidity of a stock is measured by the market impact cost, which is essentially the cost involved in transacting a stock. For a stock to qualify for inclusion in the Nifty50, it must have traded at an average impact cost of 0.50 per cent or less for six months and for 90 per cent of observation cases. Besides, the company must have a listing history of at least six months. However, a newly-listed company, which has just got listed through the IPO route, may become eligible for inclusion in the index, if it fulfils the normal eligibility criteria for a three- month period instead of six months. Only those stocks which are eligible for trade in the F&O segment of NSE are considered for inclusion as Nifty constituents. As of September 20, 2017, the Nifty had 35.73 per cent components from the financial services sector, 14 per cent from the energy sector, 11.46 per cent from the information technology sector, 10.64 per cent from the automobile sector and 10.13 per cent from the consumer goods sector. Six of the nine BFSI companies in the Nifty50 were private banks. The Nifty index also has several variants such as Nifty Junior, Nifty50 USD, Nifty50 Total Returns index and NIFTY50 Dividend Points Index. BROWSE COMPANIES:

Title: ‚ÄúWe've Built Relationships With Over 8,000 Unique Partners‚Äù
Article Content: : ASIRT is a unique association with a genuine bonding amongst the members. The bonding goes beyond business and connects each other emotionally as well. The consortium concept within ASIRT gives the members to further deepen the bonding amongst the members. They are active participant in every activity whether it is fun, sports, arts, knowledge, spiritual practices etc. It‚Äôs a pleasure to be part of ASIRT, and I‚Äôm proud to be a key sponsor for 'The Synergy Biz Conclave 2024' ‚Äîit‚Äôs truly an honor for me. : I am a first-generation entrepreneur and have been honest and driven. While business is important, I focus more on how I can grow as a person. Business, profitability, and making a living will follow naturally. I‚Äôm happy to have built something from the ground up, starting from zero. Also, I am looking far beyond this business as well. :¬† Yes, my son completed his MBA from NMIMS, and has joined Bluecom to support the growth of our dream company. Since the industry is going through a transformation phase, I am happy to see him lead many efforts to grow further. Today, it‚Äôs all about a solution-centric approach. Customers no longer want just products; they want comprehensive solutions. This shift is something I expect him to drive within the company. He has the bandwidth to keep up with the latest technology. He is grooming and learning new technologies and initiatives in the market to integrate with his existing portfolio of products. I am looking forward to him as we will reach to new heights under the leadership of the new generation.¬† : Without their support and confidence, Bluecom would not have reached where it is now. Distribution is Bluecom‚Äôs one of the strongest verticals. This is the comprehensive approach that we have reached in the distribution vertical this far. In a highly competitive market like Mumbai, where we focus on niche Lenovo products in distribution, we've managed to reach nearly 550 unique partners in a single quarter which is humungous. To date, we've built relationships with over 8,000 unique partners, demonstrating the kind of market coverage we have. We've been able to succeed because we don‚Äôt approach sales in the typical way. For instance, even after six months, if there's an issue with a product, we've offered reversals and ensured service is provided. We‚Äôre clearly on the right path, and I‚Äôm excited for what‚Äôs ahead. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Huawei Unveils $2,800 Tri-Fold Smartphone to Challenge Apple‚Äôs iPhone 16 Launch
Article Content: Huawei Technologies unveiled its latest $2,800 tri-fold smartphone on Tuesday, aiming to strengthen its position in the world‚Äôs largest smartphone market and draw attention away from Apple, just hours after Apple's latest iPhone 16 launch. The Chinese technology company exhibited the latest Mate XT, a three-way foldable handset such as an accordion screen door, in the Shenzhen tech hub launch ceremony. The smartphone has already received over 4 million pre-orders that required no deposit, as per the company‚Äôs website. According to research organization IDC, the entire global market for foldable phones, in the second quarter, was around 4 million units. The world‚Äôs first triple foldable phone has arrived. Breaking boundaries and redefining possibilities. Delivering an immersive and dynamic experience completely unlike anything you have ever imagined.      "Today we bring you a product that everyone can think of but could not make. Our team has been working hard for five years and has never given up," Richard Yu, Huawei executive director stated at the launch. "Today we will once again rewrite the history of the industry, turn science fiction into reality, and lead a new era of folding devices." AI functions are bolstered with in-house Kylin chips of Huawei, he added. The new phone features an AI assistant alongside translation, text summary, and editing functions, along with AI-boosted image editing capabilities such as removing unwanted parts from the photos, Yu said. The highly anticipated launch follows right hours after Apple¬†introduced its latest lineup - the AI-supported iPhone 16, both smartphones are due to up on sale on 20  September. The Mate XT is available in red and black colours and boasts a 10.2-inch display screen. The company claims that its 3.6mm width makes it the slimmest foldable phone in the world and also has a keyboard attached easy to fit in the pocket. The 256-gigabyte model is priced at 19,999 yuan, with higher memory options available at 21,999 yuan and 23,999 yuan, as per Reuters. The launch, following a string of successful smartphone releases, highlights Huawei's resilience in overcoming U.S. sanctions and strengthens its position over Apple in China, where consumers have criticized the iPhone 16 for lacking AI features. Apple is still in search of an AI partner in China to enhance its iPhone 16 series, while its AI software, Apple Intelligence, will not be available in Chinese languages until next year. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Title: ‚ÄúMannat Writing Board Software Is Going To Revolutionize The Industry‚Äù
Article Content: We have been contributing to the education industry for a while now, and it was our vision from the beginning to develop our own writing board software with all the latest features. This idea has been with us since we started the operations of our company almost five years ago. Today, I am very happy to say that it has finally been accomplished. This is our contribution to the nation, demonstrating that we are not dependent on any other country for software solutions; we have created our own. 'Mannat' Writing Board software is going to revolutionize the industry as it is the first software integrated with inbuilt content for everything. Currently, we have added NCERT content and plan to include ICSE board content and other curricula. We also aim to convert the content videos into 14 regional languages, making it accessible to a wider audience. Our goal is to make digital teaching available on all panels so that everyone can benefit from it. Over the past 25 years, since the advent of smart classes, there has always been a challenge of using different software for content and writing boards, causing confusion among teachers. With five years of hard work, we have finally integrated a whiteboard with content, making it user-friendly and easy for teachers to use. Before launching, we took feedback from over 200 to 500 teachers by showing them free demos and organizing classes to understand their needs and preferences. Based on their feedback, we have included mathematical tools, chemistry tools, physics tools, images, videos, books, PPTs, 3D images, and more. Previously, various software offered limited features, but now we have consolidated everything into one software, making it a win-win situation for us. As industry leaders, we wanted a leading personality to represent our brand. We didn't want someone who plays a secondary or tertiary role; we wanted a hero. Abhay Deol perfectly fits this image. Additionally, he was my daughter's choice as well, which made the decision even more meaningful. We initially discussed the idea with him last year, and after waiting for a year, we are finally able to bring this collaboration. This product is not only compatible with our hardware, but anyone, any brand, can purchase and use it with their hardware. The idea is that the future battle lies in software, not hardware. While hardware is common among people, software presents a challenge. We have taken the initiative, as we always do, because we are the leaders and must act as such. Others had an equal opportunity to do so, but no one took advantage of it. We believe we have been blessed to do it. The first version is already available, and every month, users will receive a new update. We aim to achieve a market share of 30 to 40% in next one year. In August, we are launching the Android version as well, so anyone can use it on Android or Windows. Initially, we are collaborating with our partners and all the brands associated with us. We provide them with our software, which they can sell under their own branding. We are also offering this as a white-label solution. I believe that within the next year, most brands will be associated with our software and will adopt it. Just like in all government projects where the government has mandated the use of Indian software and products, they require software for both Android and Windows platforms, and both should be the same. I think we will be the only company in India to have this capability. No other company offers software for both Windows and Android with the same specifications and features. While many Chinese companies are doing this, they face restrictions from the government. Therefore, I believe that India will be the only country where a manufacturer will have both Android and Windows versions with the same specs and features. The digital revolution is underway, and we are committed to contributing our best efforts to it. We are not leading a revolution but are merely playing a part in it, striving to add our numbers and efforts to the cause. The success of our contribution relies on the support and love from people and the guidance of God. I promise to India that this year, we will have India's largest IT manufacturing facility in Punjab. We have already acquired the land, and the construction work is underway. This year, we promise to have the largest manufacturing unit in India, located in Punjab. We have already initiated many steps in this direction, and I believe we will be able to start the factory around Diwali. This will be our gift to India. We are also exporting our software application. We have orders from Dubai, and many customers from Dubai are interested. Even our vendors, from whom we buy raw materials, are willing to buy the software under their name. However, my idea was to start from India. Once the software gains popularity in India, we can then expand to other countries. We have already developed a website for online purchases. People can buy online from our Dubai office. We are open to customization requests as well, and we can tailor the software to meet specific needs. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: HONOR 200 Lite Launching on September 19 with Stunning Features and Elegant Design
Article Content: HONOR¬†is expanding its portfolio in the market with the addition of the third member in the¬†HONOR¬†200¬†series family - the¬†HONOR¬†200¬†Lite¬†set to launch in India on¬†19th September 2024 12 noon. The smartphone will enhance user experience with its super light-weight body, exceptional portrait photography and a stunning yet comforting display, this device offers all of these features wrapped in a sleek, durable, and elegant design. With its effortless usability and cutting-edge technology, the¬†HONOR¬†200¬†Lite¬†will be available for purchase on¬†Amazon.in, , and at mainline stores At the centre of the HONOR 200 Lite is its triple camera system, designed to deliver unparalleled photo quality. Equipped with a 108MP Main Camera (f/1.75 aperture), Wide & Depth Camera (f/2.2 aperture), and Macro Camera (f/2.4 aperture), the device captures vibrant and detailed images even in low light conditions. The versatile portrait modes‚Äîfeaturing 1x Environmental Portrait, 2x Atmospheric Portrait, and 3x Close-up Portrait‚Äîallow users to take professional-quality photos at different focal lengths. The 50MP Front Camera is perfect for selfies, featuring AI Wide-angle Selfie functionality that adjusts to a 90¬∞ Field of View (FOV) for group selfies, ensuring everyone fits into the frame. Additionally, the Selfie Light adds a professional touch by enhancing the clarity and detail of every shot. The HONOR 200 Lite combines durability with style. Measuring just 6.78mm thick and weighing 166g, the device is built to withstand everyday wear and tear and accidental drops, earning an SGS 5-star Drop Resistance certification. Its sleek design comes in vibrant color options like Starry Blue, Cyan Lake, and Midnight Black, catering to different users‚Äô style preferences. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: AI and Automation Drive 50% Faster Software Development, OutSystems and KPMG Survey Reveals
Article Content: As the reach of¬†artificial intelligence (AI)¬†expands, IT leaders are exploring new use cases for technology used throughout the¬†software¬†development lifecycle (SDLC), according to a new survey launched today titled ‚ÄúAI in¬†software¬†development: Exploring opportunities and uncertainties‚Äù by¬†OutSystems, a global leader transforming how companies innovate through¬†software, and¬†KPMG, a multinational professional services network. The research surveyed 555¬†software¬†executives around the world whose companies span IT consultancy services, manufacturing, banking, financial services and insurance among others. 84 percent of respondents reported that their organizations first began to incorporate AI technologies in their SDLCs between six months to five years ago, with the earliest adopters primarily being IT services companies. Across regions, EMEA and North America remain roughly on equal footing, while APAC is steadily catching up. The findings show that testing, quality assurance, and security vulnerability detection are by far the most widely adopted use cases for AI in¬†software¬†development. Nonetheless,¬†generative AI (GenAI)¬†is set to transform the industry by significantly enhancing these processes and introducing unprecedented capabilities. Early adopters are planning to increase their use of AI in other stages of the SDLC, such as user interface design, code generation, DevOps optimization, and application maintenance. Nearly all respondents are planning to increase their investment in AI-augmented SDLC management over the next two years, indicating that AI will play a central role in¬†driving¬†innovation and competitive advantage in the¬†software¬†industry. ‚ÄúAI is redefining the impossible,‚Äù said Paulo Rosado, CEO and founder at OutSystems. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm laser-focused on helping teams compress multi-year legacy modernization projects into just a few months. The latest AI disruptions have brought us the potential to compress these development timelines into even shorter and¬†faster¬†projects. With AI, historically impossible transformation projects are not only possible but easier, cheaper, and¬†faster¬†to accomplish.‚Äù ‚ÄúRight now, the developer‚Äôs role is shifting from code writer to code reviewer,‚Äù said Rodrigo Coutinho, Co-founder and AI Project Manager at OutSystems. ‚ÄúLarge language models (LLMs) are a big help, but they still make mistakes. But as these models evolve, and trust in the resulting code improves, the developer‚Äôs role will be more akin to that of an orchestrator and acceptance tester of AI-generated outputs.‚Äù Despite being a nascent technology a couple of years ago, the report found that confidence in the quality of AI-generated code has risen substantially‚Äîhalf of respondents said that the implementation of AI has improved¬†software¬†quality, enhanced decision-making, and increased efficiency in¬†software¬†testing and quality assurance. But confidence is also paired with risk awareness surrounding tech debt in the form of orphan code and hallucinations, a lack of context for an organization‚Äôs specific coding needs, and scalability concerns. With strategy baked into AI in SDLC processes, 56% of respondents said they experienced or expected to experience a higher quality of applications, with fewer bugs and improved performance. ¬† The AI opportunity is undeniably huge, but its wider adoption in other areas of the SDLC beyond¬†software¬†testing and vulnerability detection still face some barriers. Chief among these are data privacy and security concerns (56% of respondents) and regulatory and compliance challenges (42%). Moreover, 38% of executives cite difficulties integrating generative AI into existing workflows as the primary barrier to adoption. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a lot of speculation on what will change with the rise of GenAI,‚Äù said Michael Harper, Managing Director at KPMG U.S. ‚ÄúWhile there will be challenges, those with effective change management initiatives will reskill and upskill their workforces, leading to AI and jobs evolving in tandem.‚Äù The speed and sprawl of AI, namely GenAI, is paving the way for an increase in investments for nearly all respondents. But risks concerning the reliability of AI-generated code persist, though they can be mitigated with existing approaches, such as user acceptance testing, unit testing, and regression testing. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs up to the developer working with AI to guarantee the quality of the deliverables, but this becomes way more efficient with AI,‚Äù said Coutinho. ‚ÄúAI is, in fact, a great partner in creating tests in synthetic data.‚Äù Other oft-cited concerns were the limited availability of skilled personnel and difficulties integrating GenAI into existing tech stacks and workflows. Fears of job losses are high as well, with 89% of respondents claiming that certain roles will be eliminated by AI. This falls in line with a broader industry trend over the last couple of years. However, in the longer term, AI may well create more jobs than it displaces, resulting in a new type of developer, equipped with specialized AI skill sets. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: AWS Selects Seven Indian Startups for Global Generative AI Accelerator Program
Article Content: Amazon Web Services (AWS) announced that¬†seven¬†generative AI¬†startups¬†from India have been selected for the¬†AWS¬†Global Generative AI Accelerator¬†program. The selected¬†Indian¬†startups‚Äî¬† ,¬† ,¬† ,¬† ,¬† ¬† , and¬† , are among the 80 companies selected by¬†AWS¬†worldwide for their innovative use of AI and their global growth ambitions. The¬†Indian¬†cohort also represents the highest number of¬†startups¬†selected from a country in the Asia-Pacific region for the¬†AWS¬†Global Generative AI Accelerator program.¬†The selected¬†startups¬†will also be invited to¬†AWS‚Äôs premier annual event, re:Invent, in Las Vegas, where they will showcase their solutions on a global stage. As part of¬†AWS‚Äôs US$230 million commitment¬†to accelerate the creation of applications worldwide,¬†the¬†AWS¬†Generative AI Accelerator program provides¬†startups, especially early-stage companies, with¬†AWS¬†credits, mentorship, and education to further their use of AI and ML technologies. Selected¬†startups¬†will gain access to¬†AWS¬†compute, storage, and database technologies, as well as¬†AWS¬†Trainium¬†and¬†AWS¬†Inferentia2, energy-efficient AI chips that offer high performance at the lowest cost. The credits can also be used on¬†Amazon SageMaker, a fully managed service that helps companies build and train their own foundation models (FMs), as well as to access models and tools to easily and securely build generative AI applications through¬†Amazon Bedrock. The 10-week program matches participants with both business and technical mentors based on their industry, and chosen¬†startups¬†will receive up to US$1 million each in¬†AWS¬†credits to help them build, train, test, and launch their generative AI solutions. Participants will also have access to technology and technical sessions from program presenting partner NVIDIA, a pioneer in accelerated computing. ‚ÄúWe are thrilled to announce the¬†seven¬†Indian¬†startups¬†that have been selected for the¬†AWS¬†global generative AI accelerator program. The¬†Indian¬†cohort represents the highest number of¬†startups¬†selected for the accelerator in the Asia-Pacific and Japan region. The selected¬†startups¬†are at the forefront of tapping into the transformative potential of generative AI to build innovative solutions,‚Äù said¬† . "At¬†AWS, our $230 million commitment and global expansion of the generative AI accelerator reflects our continued focus on supporting¬†startups¬†to develop, build and scale their unique ideas using generative AI. We are excited to witness the pioneering advancements that the selected¬†startups¬†will bring to solve complex challenges in India¬†and¬†worldwide." In India,¬†AWS¬†continues to support generative AI¬†startups¬†through initiatives such as¬† a collaborative pop-up space recently hosted in Bangalore to promote innovation in AI. It offered visitors a unique platform to gain insights and explore real-world applications of generative AI across industries. According to PitchBook Data, Inc, 1,813 AI and ML companies have raised funding in India with over US$82 billion in investments to date in 2024. However,¬†only 35% of generative AI companies globally have offices in locations outside their headquarter country, revealing that more can be done to support¬†startups¬†realize their growth ambitions. ‚ÄúAsia-Pacific-based generative AI companies have raised over $2.5 billion in 2024, more than the prior three years combined,‚Äù said¬† , Senior Analyst, Emerging Technology Research, PitchBook. ‚ÄúDevelopers and¬†startups¬†are seizing the opportunity to train custom models based on unique cultural and linguistic data. Additionally, leading AI researchers are working on a diversity of transformer models in multimodal domains including 3D images, interactive media, and synthetic voice. The future of AI applications will rely on specialized model architectures and¬†startups¬†will need world-class cloud infrastructure to fulfill their vision.‚Äù Here is the list of¬†Indian¬†startups¬†selected for¬†AWS¬†Global Generative AI Accelerator program.¬†Click here¬†to see the complete list of 80¬†startups¬†selected worldwide for the accelerator program. Convrse develops an AI-based tool to optimize complex 3D objects or scenes and make them web or real-time ready. House of Models leverages LLM and Diffuser models to generate digital content for brands and businesses, including images, videos, and product descriptions. | Neural Garage uses generative AI to sync actors' lips with dubbed audio in film, streaming, advertising, and broadcasting, offering seamless viewing without compromising the cinematic feel. ¬†|¬† Orbo.ai uses generative AI to provide hyper-personalization and contextual search solutions for the beauty and personal care industries. ¬†|¬† Phot.ai is a comprehensive AI-powered platform that simplifies photo editing and graphic design through a wide range of tools designed to help e-commerce sellers optimize their workflows. ¬†|¬† Unscript AI uses generative AI to create studio-quality videos with real or virtual actors, without the cost or time involved with physical shooting. Zocket simplifies digital advertising using generative AI for ad creation, targeting, and analytics, making it easy for businesses of all sizes to manage and optimize campaigns ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Title: Christie Digital is Well-Equipped to Meet and Exceed The Evolving Demands of The Entertainment Industry
Article Content: Since 2014, we have proudly led the Indian market in high-brightness projection segment, consistently maintaining our position at the forefront with products that exceed 6000 lumens. Our journey in innovation doesn‚Äôt stop there; we are continuously advancing in the realm of direct view LED displays. To date, we have successfully completed over 200 installations across India, demonstrating our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. One of our most groundbreaking achievements is the introduction of our MicroTiles LED. This product represents a significant leap forward in direct view LED technology, offering unique features and unparalleled performance that set it apart in the industry. Our dedication to innovation and quality ensures that we not only meet but exceed the expectations of our clients, solidifying our reputation as a leader in high-brightness and direct view LED solutions in India. Today, we proudly offer what is possibly the largest range of DLP projectors available from any manufacturer, with units spanning from 5,000 to 50,000 lumens. However, our expertise extends far beyond projectors alone. We have distinguished ourselves by providing comprehensive integrated solutions that cater to diverse customer needs. Products like Pandoras Box, Terra, and Mystique exemplify our commitment to delivering turnkey solutions, solidifying Christie's reputation as a one-stop solutions provider. Projection technology continues to play a crucial role in immersive entertainment due to its unparalleled flexibility, seamlessly adapting to both indoor and outdoor environments. Looking ahead, we envision an even tighter integration of projectors with advanced content management and processing solutions, such as our Pandoras Box. This product is specifically designed for immersive environments, ensuring a cohesive and captivating experience for audiences. By combining our extensive range of high-performance projectors with our cutting-edge integrated solutions, we are well-equipped to meet and exceed the evolving demands of the entertainment industry. Projectors are becoming smaller in size but able to output higher lumens, powered by various illumination technologies such as RGB pure laser that pushes the boundaries of color reproduction, brightness, resolution, image uniformity, installation versatility, and operational lifetime. This makes projection technology ideal for the creation of unparalleled shared experiences. We are also seeing greater integration with powerful software tools to simplify the deployment process for live events. Our Christie Mystique automated camera-based alignment software is a case in point. It enables users to quickly install, align, calibrate and maintain multi-projection systems. Additionally, projection technology is increasingly being integrated with AR and VR to create immersive environments. This trend is particularly significant in sectors such as education, training, entertainment, and retail, where it enhances the user experience by blending physical and digital worlds. At the same time, with growing environmental concerns, there is a push towards more energy-efficient and eco-friendly projector designs. Christie projectors are designed with sustainability in mind and the Christie Griffyn 4K50-RGB pure laser projector is a good example. Even though it has a high brightness output of 50,000 lumens, it‚Äôs also the most energy-efficient laser projector available today in its class, generating an incredible 15.9 lumens per watt. Comparable projectors in the same class only deliver an average of 10 lumens per watt. Christie will continue to embrace continuous innovation, prioritize customer-centricity, and adopt sustainable practices. We will also maintain our efforts in investing in R&D to advance technologies like RGB pure laser projection, and direct-view LED. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Commvault Report Reveals Increased Investment in Cyber Resilience by Breached Organizations
Article Content: Commvault, released new critical insights from its¬†2024 Cyber Recovery Readiness¬†Report. This global survey of 1,000 security and IT professionals across 11 countries,¬†reveals¬†interesting behavior changes for organizations that have been breached versus those that have not. The¬†Commvault¬†survey, done in collaboration with GigaOm, shows that organizations that have endured cyber incidents in the past don't want to get burned again. Consequently, they often reassess and invest in cyber resilience and recovery strategies in very meaningful ways. According to the survey: Investments in cyber resilience increase:¬†Organizations that have been breached spend nearly 30% more on cybersecurity measures than those that haven't. More attention is given to understanding data risk profiles:¬†Breached organizations are nearly 2.5 times more likely to prioritize understanding their data risk profiles, which highlight data types and relative levels of risk. Cyber readiness testing is prioritized:¬†Breached organizations conduct more testing to find gaps in their cyber preparedness plans. Twenty percent of organizations that haven't been breached do not test their recovery plan at all, that number drops to just 2% for organizations that have been breached. The impact of these added investments and focus on cyber resilience is significant. According to the survey, breached organizations that have invested in comprehensive cyber recovery plans recover 41% faster than their less-prepared counterparts. In terms of specific recovery times, breached organizations state that they are 32% more likely to recover within 48 hours compared to those that have not been breached ‚Äì a much better outcome than the recovery times noted by other respondents, which could be three weeks or more. This reduced downtime can translate to significant savings, both in terms of direct financial losses and the preservation of customer trust and brand reputation. "We've all heard the expression hindsight is 20/20, and that could not be more applicable when it comes to the findings of this survey," said¬† . "Our survey shows that the most resilient organizations are those that continuously test and refine their recovery strategies, learning from each incident to strengthen their defenses. It's this proactive mindset, rather than reactive spending, that makes the difference." Much like health insurance, where the cost of coverage often far outweighs the potential expenses of medical emergencies, cyber recovery readiness serves a similar purpose. The¬†report¬†underscores that the costs of being breached ‚Äì ranging from operational disruption to regulatory fines ‚Äì far exceed the expenses of proactive cyber resilience measures. "The findings should be a call to action for all organizations, not just those that have been breached," said¬† . "Cyber threats are constantly evolving, and so too must the strategies to counter them. It's about adopting a holistic approach to cyber resilience that integrates people, processes, and technology, ensuring readiness at every level." In addition to these findings,¬†Commvault¬†and GigaOm were able to pinpoint five key capabilities, also called resiliency markers, that when deployed together, helped companies recover faster from cyberattacks and experience fewer breaches compared to companies that did not follow the same path. These five resiliency markers emerged after data analysis teams combed through the same survey results across a range of topics including: how often companies were breached, what resilience technologies were (or were not) deployed, and how rapidly businesses were able to recover data and resume normal operations. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Milioni vozaƒça u Srbiji ne znaju, ova linija znaƒçi STOP - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Pravilo desne strane je fundamentalno naƒçelo regulisanja saobraƒáaja, odnono odreƒëivanja prvenstva prolaza, u sluƒçajevima kada se ukr≈°taju putevi iste va≈ænosti. Prva lekcija u auto-≈°kolama jeste upravo ta da, ukoliko ne postoji  znak, ili druga oznaka, propustite vozilo koja vam nailazi sa desne strane, u sluƒçaju da nailazite na put iste va≈ænosti. Postoji, meƒëutim, i druga signalizacija koja ima gotovo istu snagu, a da su je vozaƒçi potpuno izgubli iz vida. Meƒëutim, u sluƒçaju saonraƒáajne nesreƒáe mo≈æete biti krivi i platiti ≈°tetu, a da pojma nemate da ste izazvali udes nepo≈°tujuƒái zakon.  se, naime, deli na vertikalnu signalizaciju i horizontalnu signalizaciju. Bilo da se radi o vertikalnoj ili horizontalnoj saobraƒçajnoj signalizaciji, njena namena je regulisanje ili usmeravanje saobraƒáaja, obele≈æavanje vozila ili obezbeƒëivanje mesta izvoƒëenja radova na kolovozu. Horizontalna signalizacija Horizontalna signalizacija predstavlja skup posebno oblikovanih geometrijskih elemenata linija, figura, polja i natpisa koji formiraju oznake na saobraƒáajnim povr≈°inama. Horizontalna signalizacija postoji i na drugim povr≈°inama: parkinzima, trotoarima, komunikacijama unutar gara≈æa, aerodromskim pistama itd. Osnovna podela horizontalne signalizacije potiƒçe od namene oznaka. Ova podela uslovljena je polo≈æajem oznaka u odnosu na simetralu kolovoza puta ili ulice: uzdu≈æne oznake(razdelne linije, iviƒçne linije, linije vodilje i sl), popreƒçne oznake, linije zaustavljanja (ova oznaka se ƒçesto naziva i "stop" linija), pe≈°aƒçki prelazi, prelazi biciklistiƒçkih staza, kosnici,graniƒçnici, itd. i ostale oznake, strelice, natpisi, polja i linije za usmeravanje, oznake za parkiranje itd. Damir Okanoviƒá, direktor Komiteta za bezbednost saobraƒáaja, navodi da horizontalna signalizacija ima obavezujuƒái karakter. "Po va≈æeƒáim propisima ako na prilazu raskrsnici nisu postavljeni STOP ili obrnuti trougao, a na kolovozu postoji linija zaustavljanja (zaustavna linija) vozaƒçi se obave≈°tavaju o obavezi zaustavljanja odnosno propu≈°tanja vozila na putu na koji nailaze, samom zaustavnom linijom. Po≈°to vozaƒç mo≈æe da ne vidi zaustavnu liniju usled npr. snega na kolovozu ili vozila koje se kreƒáe ispred njegovog, nije dobro da na raskrsnici bude samo zaustavna linija bez znaka STOP ili bez obrnutog trougla. Zbog toga uƒçesnici u saobraƒáaju kada primete da postoji zaustavna linija a nema znaka STOP ili obrnutog trougla, treba da obaveste upravljaƒça puta kako bi postavili saobraƒáajni znak", obja≈°njava Okanoviƒá. Ako blagovremeno uoƒçite zaustavnu liniju na kolovozu, a ne propustite vozila na putu na koji ste nai≈°li, mo≈æete prekr≈°ajno ali i kriviƒçno odgovarati. Zbog toga obratite pa≈ænju i na horizontalnu signalizaciju kada nailazite na raskrnicu, jer mo≈æe skupo da vas ko≈°ta. (Telegraf.rs) Po≈°aljite nam Va≈°e snimke, fotografije i priƒçe na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Telegraf.rs zadr≈æava sva prava nad sadr≈æajem. Za preuzimanje sadr≈æaja
            pogledajte uputstva na stranici  . D≈æabe propisi kada su dana≈°nji vozaƒçi nepismeni bahati i bezobrazni , a policije nigde. D≈æaba sva signalizacija, skoro niko ne staje na znak STOP. Ovde samo betonska rampa poma≈æe. Ljudi ne znaju da osiguranje ne pokriva ≈°tetu ikoliko se ne stane na znak STOP i izazove udes !  Da li ≈æelite da dobijate obave≈°tenja o najnovijim vestima?

Title: Sekel Technologies Aiming to Empower Small Retailers to Compete On A Level Playing Field With Larger Brands
Article Content: Sekel Tech addresses some of the most pressing challenges businesses face today, particularly in the hyperlocal digital marketing space. Our primary focus is on enhancing customer engagement and responsiveness, areas where many businesses struggle. By integrating real-time insights, automated marketing, and cutting-edge data analytics, we ensure marketing efforts are streamlined with precision. This helps in reducing the turnaround time for businesses to go hyperlocal from several months to just 48 hours. This agility allows businesses to meet the growing demand for near-me searches and quick commerce, ensuring they remain relevant and competitive in a rapidly changing market.  Since Sekel Tech was launched, it has evolved by continuously adapting to the changing landscape of consumer behaviour. Our revamped product dashboard is a testament to this evolution. We have incorporated features like the ability to post directly to Google My Business Listings and run paid ad campaigns on platforms like Google, Facebook, and Instagram‚Äîall from a single dashboard. Additionally, we've improved our SellerApp, which now enables businesses to retarget customers via SMS, Email, and WhatsApp. The emphasis is on simplicity, speed, and security, with our solutions being fully compliant with the Security Operations Centre (SOC) Framework. These changes are driven by a deep understanding of how consumers interact with technology today, making our dashboard more intuitive and user-friendly, allowing businesses to unlock hidden potentials with ease.  Our new logo and tagline, ‚ÄòGoing Beyond,‚Äô symbolise Sekel Tech‚Äôs commitment to innovation and our forward-thinking approach. The pantone blue and black colour scheme embodies trust, stability, and our cutting-edge solutions. This brand evolution reflects our focus on dynamic engagement, always being in motion, and delivering location-specific, tech-specific solutions that truly resonate with our clients. ‚ÄòGoing Beyond‚Äô is not a mere tagline, but reflects a promise that we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in hyperlocal marketing, ensuring that our clients are equipped to exceed their goals in this new era of consumer engagement.  We understand that small retailers often lack the time and resources for extensive training. That is primarily why we have designed our tools to be intuitive and user-friendly. The revamped dashboard offers a streamlined experience, allowing retailers to go live within 48 hours without needing to navigate complex systems. Additionally, our support team is always ready to assist with any queries, ensuring that even those with minimal technical expertise can leverage our solutions effectively. Our goal is to empower small retailers to compete on a level playing field with larger brands, without the burden of extensive learning curves.  The new features on our dashboard are transformative for small retailers, enabling them to engage with local customers more effectively and efficiently. With direct access to platforms like Google My Business and the ability to run targeted ad campaigns on social media, retailers can now connect with their customers in real time, responding to their needs more swiftly. The integration of retargeting options through SMS, Email, and WhatsApp further enhances their ability to maintain continuous engagement. These features ensure that small retailers can build stronger, more personalised relationships with their customers, driving loyalty and boosting sales in a competitive marketplace. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: U Srbiju sti≈æu polovnjaci s 1 problemom: Evo kako da prepoznate da je automobil bio poplavljen - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Poplave prete Evropi, u Rumuniji je sve pod vodom, drama je u Austriji, . Nije tajna da nam polovnjaci najvi≈°e dolaze iz Evrope, a buduƒái da Srbi vole da pazare automobile sa Zapada, bitno je proveriti da li su pre≈æiveli poplavu ili su sve vreme bili na suvom! Ovo su neki znakovi da je automobil bio poplavljen: Obratite pa≈ænju na koroziju - Automobili u godinama, koji su pre≈°li vi≈°e stotina hiljada kilometara, sa spoljne strane mogu imati koroziju, ali ne i unutra! Ono ≈°to morate da znate jeste, da korozija unutar kabine se ne pojavljuje ni nakon 30 godina vo≈ænje.. Naravno ako automobil nije bio potopljen. Meƒëutim, ukoliko je bio potopljen, koroziju je moguƒáe primetiti u donjim taƒçkama kabine. U tom sluƒçaju najbolje je detaljno pogledati gepek i prostor oko rezervnog toƒçka. Obavezno podignite rubove tepiha i vidite ≈°ta je ispod njih. Za kraj obavezno pogledajte ≈°ine sedi≈°ta i prostor ispod sedi≈°ta (koristite ogledalo i baterijsku lamu ako je nepristupaƒçno). Kako su pomenute ≈°ine presvuƒçene najtanjim slojem za≈°tite, njihova korozija bi mogla da uka≈æe na to da je automobil bio potopljen. Problem sa elektronikom - Ako majstor ne mo≈æe da popravi gre≈°ku u elektronici, eto vama moguƒánosti da je automobil bio poplavljen! Kako instalacije prve stradaju od strane korozije, obavezno je proveriti da li svi pokazivaƒçi i sva svetla rade, kako spolja tako i iznutra, potom da li ventilacija i klima rade, zajedno sa upaljaƒçem. Tokom testiranja automobila pre kupovine, obavezno pri paljenju oslu≈°nite da li automobil, tj. njegova elektronika proizvodi neoƒçekivane zvukove, ili neoƒçekivan smrad paljevine, koji mo≈æe da uka≈æe na neispravnost elektronike. Promena tepiha, neba i presvlaka - Ukoliko se radi o skupom automobilu, izvlaƒçenje vlage i kori≈°ƒáenje hemikalija nije opcija, veƒá ƒáe majstori preko grane posegnuti za promenom tepiha, neba i presvlaka. U sluƒçaju da je automobil stariji od 6-7 godina, lako se mo≈æe ustanoviti da se radi o novim veƒá pomenutim elementima. Amortizacija oko prostora stopala, i na vozaƒçevom ili suvozaƒçevom mestu, treba treba detaljno da se pregleda, jer ako je automobil vo≈æen vi≈°e od 6-7 godina, znakovi amortizacije i rabljena moraju da budu prisutni (izlizanost tepiha na pojedinim mestima recimo). Ako su presvlake nove, pa ruƒçno ≈°ivene, to mo≈æe biti "red flag" za automobil koji je realno stariji. (Telegraf.rs) Po≈°aljite nam Va≈°e snimke, fotografije i priƒçe na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Kriterijumi za odreƒëivanje vremena tokom koga ƒçuvamo ove podatke su:

Postojanje specifiƒçnih zakonskih obaveza koje obradu i srodno skladi≈°tenje zahtevaju u odreƒëenom vremenskom periodu. Va≈°i podaci ƒáe biti obraƒëivani do:

U tekstu koji sledi podsetiƒáu vas na nekoliko kompozicije iz tog opusa. Ovo je prva ploƒça koju je Kornelije Kovaƒç objavio pod svojim imenom nakon razlaza Korni grupe. Seƒáam se da sam komoziciju "Okean" prvi put ƒçuo kada sam bio osmi razred. Bio sam naprosto oƒçaran. Toliko mi se svideo taj instrumental da sam odmah shvatio kako tu ploƒçu moram imati ≈°to pre. Nakon ovog fantastiƒçnog singla, mnogi su oƒçekivali (meƒëu njima i ja) sledeƒái Kornelijev potez. U stvari ƒçekao se album. Na ploƒçi se nalazi i par sjajnih instrumentala poput "Scottish Bird", a tu je i instrumentalna verzija poznate pesme Korni grupe, "Put za istok". Tih godina slu≈°ao sam ga jako puno, jednostavno nisam mogao da prestanem. Iako je Kornelije i dalje objavljivao svoja solo ostvarenja, ja ƒáu u ovoj priƒçi upravo ovde stati. Title: Sveƒçano otvoren 20. Festival ‚Äû7 veliƒçanstvenih‚Äú u Mts dvorani - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
U petak 13. septembra sveƒçano je otvoren 20. festival evropskog dugometra≈ænog dokumentarnog filma ‚Äú7 veliƒçanstvenih‚Äù u Mts dvorani. Prisutnima su se na otvaranju obratili direktor festivala Zoran Popoviƒá, festivalski selektor Tue Stin Miler, i autor filma otvaranja ‚ÄûPijanoforte‚Äú Jakub Pjontek. Zoran Popoviƒá, direktor festivala ‚Äû7 veliƒçanstvenih‚Äú, na otvaranju je rekao: ‚ÄûPre dvadeset godina postojao je samo san o velikom sjajnom bioskopu, o velikom platnu, o fantastiƒçnim filmovima i veliƒçanstvenoj publici. Nakon 20 godina, svi smo zajedno u tom snu, koji je uspeo da se ostvari. Da li zato ≈°to smo ulo≈æili svu na≈°u snagu, trud i energiju da otvorimo ≈°iroko vrata filmovima koji su i u Evropi tek dolazili i najavljivali jedno novo poglavlje u istoriji filma; da li zato ≈°to smo imali podr≈°ku zaista sjajnih, veliƒçanstvenih evropskih dokumentarista i jednog izuzetnog Danca koji je gotovo postao Beograƒëanin, Tue Stin Milera; da li zato ≈°to je sve to spojila jedna veliƒçanstvena, evropska publika, koja voli dokumentarni film, bioskop, i u≈æiva u onome ≈°to je magija filma. Sve to zajedno, tokom dvadeset godina, stvaralo je legendu o festivalu, koju ≈°irom Evrope pronose eminentni evropski dokumentaristi, priƒçajuƒái o neƒçemu ≈°to gotovo da nikada u svojoj karijeri nisu sreli, a dogaƒëa se u Beogradu‚Äú. Tue Stin Miler, selektor festivala, ispriƒçao je priƒçu o imaginarnom susretu Hansa Kristijana Andersena i Nikole Tesle, i njihovom razgovoru o buduƒánosti pokretnih slika. ‚ÄûOni nisu vi≈°e ovde, ali pre neki dan sedeli su na jednom oblaku iznad Beograda. Andersen je rekao Tesli kako je ipak postojala moguƒánost da se slike pokrenu. U Beogradu ima jedna taƒçka i jedno mesto gde se veƒá 20 godina prikazuju slike koje se pokreƒáu. S tvojim genijalnim umom i mojim pripovedanjem, te dve stvari su se spojile u ne≈°to ≈°to ide zajedno, ne≈°to veliƒçanstveno. Andersen je bio u pravu. ≈Ωiveo festival Sedam veliƒçanstvenih!‚Äú Jakub Pjontek, reditelj filma otvaranja ‚ÄûPijanoforte‚Äú, prisutnima se obratio reƒçima: ‚ÄûVeoma sam privilegovan ≈°to sam ovde. Mlaƒëi sam od 40 godina, pa mi 20 godina festivala izgleda kao divan san. Hvala vam na gostoprimstvu i nadam se da ƒáete u≈æivati u filmu‚Äú. Po zavr≈°etku ceremonije otvaranja, premijerno u Srbiji je prikazan film ‚ÄúPijanoforte‚Äù koji nas vodi na najƒçuvenije svetsko takmiƒçenje mladih pijanista. Kao svojevrsna pijanistiƒçka Olimpijada, svake pete godine u Var≈°avi se okupljaju vrhunski mladi umetnici i zapoƒçinju bespo≈°tednu borbu sa samima sobom da bi postigli gotovo nemoguƒáe i savladali sve te≈æe i te≈æe zadatke i eventualno pobedili. Sjajni poljski autor Jakub Pjontek napravio je uzbudljiv i intrigantan film koji nas vodi iza kulisa ovog takmiƒçenja, a najveƒáe zadovoljstvo u filmu je pijanistiƒçki i filmski briljantno predstavljena muzika koja je opƒçinila gledaoce brojnih festivala ≈°irom sveta od Sandensa do Tel Aviva. Nakon projekcije odr≈æan je razgovor sa autorom filma. Program festivala nastavlja se u subotu, 14. septembra u 20 ƒçasova, filmom ‚ÄúBalomanija‚Äù danske rediteljke Sisel Morel Dargis. Title: Teodora pravi bebu sa ko≈°arka≈°em: Veƒá rade na pro≈°irenju porodice, D≈æehvi hoƒáe da bude mlada mama?! - Telegraf.rs

Zaista su skladan par, oko svega se dogovaraju i svaƒëe kod njih su nepoznanica. Ona nikada nije bila ovako sreƒána i zaljubljena, procvetala je otkad je sa njim, puna je nekog novog elena. Odavno su zapoƒçeli zajedniƒçki ≈æivot, te sada pri≈æeljkuju bebu i veƒá neko vreme rade na tome. Oboje su porodiƒçni tipovi i ≈æele veliku porodicu. Teodora je oduvek ma≈°tala da postane mlada mama i sada je shvatila da je Matic taj kome ≈æeli da podari dete i da provede ostatak ≈æivota sa njim - otkrio je izvor blizak paru, koji je insistirao na anonimnosti i dodao da je dolaskom Teodorine bratanice na svet proradio i njen majƒçinski instinkt: - Teodorin brat Sava i snajka Adrijana nedavno su postali roditelji, ≈°to je u Teodori na neki naƒçin probudilo ≈æelju da i ona i Matic osnuju porodicu. ƒåesto ih poseƒáuje jer voli da provodi vreme sa bebom, kad god ima slobodnog vremena. Title: Oracle Expands Distributed Cloud Innovations to Drive AI and Cloud Service Advancements Across Major Platforms
Article Content: Oracle announced new¬†Oracle Cloud Infrastructure¬†(OCI)¬†distributed cloud¬†innovations to help meet the rapidly growing global demand for its AI and cloud services. The latest innovations span Oracle Database@AWS, Oracle Database@Azure, Oracle Database@Google Cloud, OCI Dedicated Region, and OCI Supercluster. With Oracle‚Äôs distributed cloud, customers can deploy OCI‚Äôs 150+ AI and cloud services at the edge, in their own datacenter, across clouds, or in the public cloud and can help address a variety of data privacy, sovereign AI, and low latency requirements. In addition, Oracle Cloud is available in more locations than any other hyperscaler, with 85 regions live and 77 planned. ‚ÄúOur priority is giving customers the choice and flexibility to leverage cloud services in the model that makes the most sense for their business,‚Äù said  . ‚ÄúWith OCI‚Äôs distributed cloud capabilities, we‚Äôre helping customers deploy a dedicated cloud in a small, scalable footprint, build applications with the best services across cloud providers, and deploy AI infrastructure anywhere they want. This flexibility helps our customers address their unique needs and support their cloud investments in delivering significant business value.‚Äù OCI is now taking orders for the largest AI supercomputer in the cloud‚Äîavailable with up to 131,072 NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs‚Äîdelivering an unprecedented 2.4 zettaFLOPS of peak performance. The maximum scale of¬†OCI Supercluster¬†offers more than three times as many GPUs as the Frontier supercomputer and more than six times that of other hyperscalers. OCI Supercluster includes OCI Compute Bare Metal, ultra-low latency RoCEv2 with ConnectX-7 NICs and ConnectX-8 SuperNICs or NVIDIA Quantum-2 InfiniBand-based networks, and a choice of HPC storage. Oracle and NVIDIA are delivering accelerated computing and generative AI services that help organizations build and maintain sovereign AI models in their country or retain AI-generated data with strong data residency controls. OCI Compute based on NVIDIA L40S GPUs, NVIDIA Hopper architecture GPUs, and NVIDIA Blackwell platforms are now orderable to support sovereign AI deployments. NVIDIA Omniverse, a platform for developing OpenUSD applications for industrial digitalization and generative physical AI, is validated on OCI and available to support many developer use cases, including sovereign AI. A new OCI Dedicated Region configuration‚ÄîDedicated Region25‚Äîwill be available in a smaller, scalable size starting at only three racks and rapidly deployable within weeks. Dedicated Region25 has a 75 percent smaller launch footprint and simplified datacenter requirements, supports OCI‚Äôs 150+ AI and cloud services and allows a wider range of customers to gain the agility, economics, and scale of the public cloud in their own datacenters. The new configuration will be available in the next calendar year. OCI enables customers to combine cloud services from multiple clouds to optimize cost, functionality, and performance. With Oracle Database@AWS, Oracle Database@Azure, and Oracle Database@Google Cloud, customers gain direct access to Oracle Database services running on OCI and deployed directly in the datacenters of the four largest hyperscalers. Through these partnerships, customer have the flexibility to run their applications across clouds and combine all the benefits of Oracle Database services with services from other cloud providers for a seamless multicloud experience. In addition, customer benefit from the simplicity, security, and low latency of a unified operating environment. OCI Roving Edge Infrastructure enhancements support remote AI inferencing: New versions of the OCI Roving Edge Device, including a new three-GPU option optimized for AI, are now generally available to help customers leverage remote AI inferencing at the edge. This enables customers to manage mission-critical data at the edge and run domain-specific LLMs or computer vision even in remote or disconnected locations. OCI Roving Edge Infrastructure consists of multiple configurations of ruggedized and portable high-performance devices, weighing less than 35 lb. (without the case), equipped with 56 cores (102 virtual CPUs), 512 GB of RAM, and up to 123 TB of storage. HeatWave delivers new GenAI and multicloud capabilities: New HeatWave capabilities and innovations help organizations easily and securely take advantage of generative AI both in OCI and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Additional new capabilities help customers quickly and securely implement lakehouse and machine learning applications for a wider variety of use cases, as well as help improve the performance and manageability of transactional applications. New OCI Generative AI innovations help customers turn data into a competitive advantage: OCI Generative AI (GenAI) Agents with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) capabilities and enhanced Oracle AI innovations are now generally available. The new capabilities help customers turn their data into a competitive advantage by making it easier to apply AI to real-world business operations. ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: mTap Digital Business Card
Article Content: Gone are the days when business networking relied heavily on traditional paper business cards. The world is rapidly embracing digital solutions, and the mTap Digital Business Card is leading the charge as a modern alternative. Designed for today's fast-paced, tech-savvy professionals, the mTap Digital Business Card offers a sleek and efficient way to manage your networking needs. We recently received the mTap Digital Business Card with premium membership, and here‚Äôs a detailed review based on real-time experience: NFC (Near Field Communication) operates through innovative wireless communication technology when brought close to a compatible device. This tool harnesses a technique similar to infrared (IR) which was once used to transfer data from one device to another in older mobile phones. The same NFC technique is used in gaming controllers and headphones to enhance compatibility with paired devices. The mTap Digital Business Card works by drawing it closer to the NFC-enabled smartphones. After tapping it on your phone, a notification pops up, and then all the business-related contact details appear on the mobile screen, containing the address, company name, designation, social media links on all registered portals, and work-related links at the receiving end. This also allows you to share your WhatsApp contact details. The analytics of this card enables its users to check the number of viewers of a profile. The card is customizable according to your brand‚Äôs colour and style to enhance your digital identity. With just a single tap and within 60 seconds via the QR code on the back, the card is all set for seamless digital professional networking. The mTap hub is designed to efficiently organize, connect, and manage contacts and interactions right from your command center. You can easily add a widget and scan a business card or another mTap card to retrieve the details. This allows you to create and manage multiple profiles for different businesses. On non-NFC enabled devices, you can use the QR code at mTap card‚Äôs back and obtain details All the contact information is easily manageable through CRM Setting up an mTap profile is easy to navigate. Simply download the app from the App Store or Play Store, then choose one of your preferred sign-up options from email, Google, Apple, or LinkedIn. After signing up, you'll be prompted to build your profile and add your website. Click "continue," and then select "yes" to allow the AI to automatically pull your LinkedIn profile, profile picture, logo, and social media handles. mTap automatically applies your brand colors to your profile by analyzing the logo. Then edit your profile to include pictures, contact details, calendar links, presentations, brochures, images, videos, text, and other links you wish to share with your prospects. In the "Manage Links" section, mTap allows adding and organizing all necessary links. The profile can be previewed by tapping on the 'Preview' option. To update your mTap account, go to the 'Main Profile' section to revise your personal and professional details. The premium membership truly elevates the mTap experience, unlocking a host of additional features that go beyond basic networking. With this membership, users can save contacts, making follow-ups and relationship management easier. Additionally, the ability to save the location where you met someone adds a unique touch, helping to contextualize connections. These features, make the premium membership a valuable investment for serious networkers looking to maximize their professional interactions. Using the mTap Digital Business Card was a seamless experience, blending innovation with practicality. The instant access to contact details and the ability to share them effortlessly left a lasting impression. The card‚Äôs customizable features allowed us to tailor the experience to reflect our brand identity, making every interaction feel personalized and professional. Overall, the mTap Digital Business Card delivered on its promise of modernizing business networking in an efficient and user-friendly way. mTap Business Card costs a one-time payment of ‚Çπ2500. In case, if the card is broken, you have to make another purchase. Other additional services are available with the purchase which can increase or decrease the price from the given range. With just a single tap on the phone, all your details are shared, which is quite commendable. The mTap Business Card is gaining popularity through word-of-mouth, and we were eager to experience the seamless sharing of professional information. After evaluating its functionality and effectiveness, we rate the mTap Business Card at 4 out of 5 stars. This score reflects its impressive ease of use and potential for enhancing networking ¬†üëâ¬† News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. ¬© 2022-2023
